original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: phra m'a na bi ni shtsa ya t'i k'a /
analyzed: phra m'a na bi ni shtsa ya t'i k'a /
translated: Pramana-viniścaya-ṭīkā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad /
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad /
translated: Explanation of the Ascertainment of Valid Cognition

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: gang zhig chags pa spangs kyang dpal ldan thams cad don grub don du gnyer ba'i gzhan dbang gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig chags pa spangs kyang dpal ldan thams cad don grub don du gnyer ba'i gzhan dbang gyur //
translated: Though abandoning attachment, he became subject to others, striving for the glorious accomplishment of all goals.

original: gang zhig 'khrug pa zad kyang sna tshogs bsam pa 'gog la bar chad med par brtson mdzad pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'khrug pa zad kyang sna tshogs bsam pa 'gog la bar chad med par brtson mdzad pa //
translated: Though exhausting afflictions, he persevered without interruption in stopping various thoughts.

original: gang zhig bdag lta spangs pa las kyang bdag gi de nyid legs par zad par thugs su'ang chud //
analyzed: gang zhig bdag lta spangs pa las kyang bdag gi de nyid legs par zad par thugs su'ang chud //
translated: Though abandoning the view of self, he also fully realized the reality of self.

original: ston pa de yid gsung rab rigs pa'i mthu yis gzhung lugs ngan pa rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa rgyal //
analyzed: ston pa de yid gsung rab rigs pa'i mthu yis gzhung lugs ngan pa rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa rgyal //
translated: The Victorious One, the Teacher, with the power of reasoning in his excellent speech, conquers evil systems.

original: gang zhig shar na phur bu la sogs skar ma rnams ni rtsis med cing //
analyzed: gang zhig shar na phur bu la sogs skar ma rnams ni rtsis med cing //
translated: When he arose, the stars like Puṣya became meaningless.

original: mngon du gyur na'ang dngos po'i yul la lta 'jug mtha' dag nyams 'gyur dang // rtag tu lta brtson rab rib zad cing yang dag dngos mthong skyes gyur pa //
analyzed: mngon du gyur na'ang dngos po'i yul la lta 'jug mtha' dag nyams 'gyur dang // rtag tu lta brtson rab rib zad cing yang dag dngos mthong skyes gyur pa //
translated: And the eye of wisdom is opened, and the darkness of the afflictions is destroyed,

original: chos kyi grags pa mi pham de ni nyi ma zla ba snang ba'ang yin //🔽gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'grel dang 'grel bshad dag /
analyzed: chos kyi grags pa mi pham de ni nyi ma zla ba snang ba'ang yin // gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'grel dang 'grel bshad dag /
translated: And the eye of wisdom is opened, and the darkness of the afflictions is destroyed,

original: @2a * // de yi bzhed dang 'gal bar mthong nas ni //🔽bla ma'i man ngag las ni tshig rnams ci tsam pa'i //🔽dngos po rnam par dpyad pa tsam zhig bdag gis bya //
analyzed: @2a * // de yi bzhed dang 'gal bar mthong nas ni // bla ma'i man ngag las ni tshig rnams ci tsam pa'i // dngos po rnam par dpyad pa tsam zhig bdag gis bya //
translated: And the eye of wisdom is opened, and the darkness of the afflictions is destroyed,

original: shin tu spros pas 'jigs pa'i phyir //🔽gzhan gyis bshad pa mi dgod de //
analyzed: shin tu spros pas 'jigs pa'i phyir // gzhan gyis bshad pa mi dgod de //

original: lam ngan spong bar 'dod pas ni //🔽slar yang der 'jug byed ma yin //🔽gang phyir chen po rnams kyis 'grel bshad mdzad gyur pa //
analyzed: lam ngan spong bar 'dod pas ni // slar yang der 'jug byed ma yin // gang phyir chen po rnams kyis 'grel bshad mdzad gyur pa //
translated: And the eye of wisdom is opened, and the darkness of the afflictions is destroyed,

original: de nyid phyir na kho bo'ang rtsol bar rigs pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na kho bo'ang rtsol bar rigs pa yin //
translated: And

original: mkha' lding nam mkha' la ni 'phur bar byed pa na //
analyzed: mkha' lding nam mkha' la ni 'phur bar byed pa na //
translated: Just as a young bird, when it flies up into the sky,

original: de yi phru gu ma tshar bar yang slob pa bzhin //
analyzed: de yi phru gu ma tshar bar yang slob pa bzhin //
translated: is taught by its mother to spread its wings.

original: bdag nyid shes pa yin pas gal te skye bo skyon brjod smra bar byed na yang //
analyzed: bdag nyid shes pa yin pas gal te skye bo skyon brjod smra bar byed na yang //
translated: If people speak of my faults, knowing that I am wise,

original: bdag la ci chad gang 'di rtsom par byed pa'ang de nyid rtogs par bya phyir yin //
analyzed: bdag la ci chad gang 'di rtsom par byed pa'ang de nyid rtogs par bya phyir yin //
translated: I will understand that they are doing it in order to teach me.

original: mang la grags na dge zhes 'jig rten na yang rab tu smra ba 'di yod de //
analyzed: mang la grags na dge zhes 'jig rten na yang rab tu smra ba 'di yod de //
translated: There is a saying in the world: “If many people know about your virtue, it becomes even greater.”

original: de yang med pa nyid du gsal bar rtogs nas smra ba smad pa'i gnas nyid yin //
analyzed: de yang med pa nyid du gsal bar rtogs nas smra ba smad pa'i gnas nyid yin //
translated: But when I see that this is not true, I am ashamed to speak.

original: phrag dog kyang ni lta rjes 'brangs nas brtan ldan zhing //
analyzed: phrag dog kyang ni lta rjes 'brangs nas brtan ldan zhing //
translated: Jealousy, too, is a fault that follows after the envious person,🔽who is not to be trusted, and who is not to be relied upon, even when he is useful,

original: gnod med brtag 'os don la'ang khyab par byed phyir dang // dug 'joms legs bshad 'o ma las kyang 'phel 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: gnod med brtag 'os don la'ang khyab par byed phyir dang // dug 'joms legs bshad 'o ma las kyang 'phel 'gyur phyir //
translated: and who, even if he has good advice, is not to be believed, because he is like poison.

original: de dang ldan pa mig dug yin par kho bos mthong //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa mig dug yin par kho bos mthong //
translated: I see that he who has it is like a poisonous eye.

original: ci ste yang dag pa'i @2b shes pa bstan par bya ba la /
analyzed: ci ste yang dag pa'i @2b shes pa bstan par bya ba la /
translated: But if I am to teach right knowledge,

original: sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag tshad ma kun las btus pa'i mdo'i brgal ba dang / lan dang bshad pa'i khyad par la gus par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma bstan pa'i gags su 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dang bsgrub par bya ba dag tshad ma kun las btus pa'i mdo'i brgal ba dang / lan dang bshad pa'i khyad par la gus par 'gyur ba'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma bstan pa'i gags su 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Since the author and the subject matter are the special topic of the Pramana-samuccaya-sutra, is it not a hindrance to the teaching of the desired valid cognition?

original: ci'i phyir khyod tshad ma rnam par nges pa rnam 'grel du byed ces rgol zhing rtog pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyod tshad ma rnam par nges pa rnam 'grel du byed ces rgol zhing rtog pa la /
translated: To the opponent who argues and thinks, Why do you compose the Pramana-viniścaya?

original: slob dpon gyis gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par nges pa rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu gsungs so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par nges pa rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu gsungs so //
translated: The Acarya states the reason for composing the Pramana-viniścaya with yatra and so forth.

original: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i snying rje de ni brtse ba ste /🔽de rgyur gyur pas gang la 'phags pas rjes su gzung ba de'i gzhung kho bos dgrol bar byas te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bsgral bar 'dod pa'i snying rje de ni brtse ba ste / de rgyur gyur pas gang la 'phags pas rjes su gzung ba de'i gzhung kho bos dgrol bar byas te /
translated: That compassion which desires to liberate from suffering and the causes of suffering is love.🔽Since that is the cause, I will explain the text of that which is accepted by the Aryas.

original: de'i mdo'i rnam 'grel bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mdo'i rnam 'grel bya'o //
translated: I will compose a commentary on that sutra.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin la 'gro ba sdug bsngal dang bral ba yang kho bo 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin la 'gro ba sdug bsngal dang bral ba yang kho bo 'dod pa yin no //
translated: Because the characteristic of a result is that which is desired, and we do desire the freedom from suffering of all beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ci ltar log pa'i shes pa las 'jug pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ci ltar log pa'i shes pa las 'jug pa sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spang ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan pa de bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, just as we teach right knowledge in order to abandon the cause of suffering, which is engagement due to false knowledge,

original: 'jig rten slob dpon la smod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bsgral ba'i don du de'i gzhung 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten slob dpon la smod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bsgral ba'i don du de'i gzhung 'chad pa yin no //
translated: so we explain the treatises of the master in order to liberate the world from the suffering of disparaging the master.

original: rnam par nges pa rang dbang du byas na ni phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas la rtog ge mi shes so zhes skye bo mi mkhas pa dag slob dpon la smod par 'gyur la /🔽de yang nye bar bsten te bsnyen par byas pa yang de yin la 'jig rten yang yin pa de rgyas mdzad de //
analyzed: rnam par nges pa rang dbang du byas na ni phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas la rtog ge mi shes so zhes skye bo mi mkhas pa dag slob dpon la smod par 'gyur la / de yang nye bar bsten te bsnyen par byas pa yang de yin la 'jig rten yang yin pa de rgyas mdzad de //
translated: If we were to compose this treatise independently, then the ignorant would disparage the master, saying, “I do not understand Dignāga’s standpoint.”🔽The world is that which is served and attended to, and the master is one who is engaged in serving and attending to that.

original: rgyas par byed pa'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: rgyas par byed pa'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: He is the one who is engaged in serving and attending to the world.

original: nye bar bstan pa'i bya ba la yang nye ba'i phyir rgyas mdzad nyid byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa'i bya ba la yang nye ba'i phyir rgyas mdzad nyid byed pa po yin no //
translated: The one who expands is the agent because he is the one who causes the activity that is taught to be near to be near.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu med par byams pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu med par byams pa'i phyir /
translated: The bodhisattva, because of his love, which is causeless,

original: 'jig rten gyi don du ma gnyer yang sbyin pa la sogs pas 'jig rten bsten cing rnam par grol ba'i skal ba can du byas pas rgyas par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi don du ma gnyer yang sbyin pa la sogs pas 'jig rten bsten cing rnam par grol ba'i skal ba can du byas pas rgyas par byed pa yin no //
translated: even though he does not strive for the benefit of the world, he benefits the world through generosity and so on, and he expands it by making it fit for liberation.

original: gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa'i bdag nyid chen po de la cung zad smad na yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don la 'jug pa'i bdag nyid chen po de la cung zad smad na yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin na /
translated: If it is a cause of suffering to slight even a little the greatness of one who is engaged in the welfare of others,

original: chen po lta ci smos //
analyzed: chen po lta ci smos //
translated: what need is there to mention a great one?

original: 'di las don ma yin pa skye ba zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di las don ma yin pa skye ba zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is meant by “non-benefit arises from this.”

original: rmongs pas te mi shes pas sgro btags nas smod pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pas te mi shes pas sgro btags nas smod pa'o //
translated: One who is confused, who does not know, slanders through superimposition.

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las don nges pa'i phyir kun las btus ma @3a * //
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa las don nges pa'i phyir kun las btus ma @3a * //
translated: Since the meaning is ascertained from Pramāṇaviniścaya,

original: bshad kyang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bshad kyang rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not understood even without the Abhidharmakośa being explained?

original: kun du rmongs pa de'i go skabs ji ltar yod ce na /
analyzed: kun du rmongs pa de'i go skabs ji ltar yod ce na /
translated: How can there be an opportunity for such confusion?

original: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The verse beginning The world and so on is stated.

original: gsal ba ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ni nges pa'o //
translated: Clear means certain.

original: 'jig rten blo gros blun po ste blo gros dman pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten blo gros blun po ste blo gros dman pa'o //
translated: The world is foolish, that is, of inferior intelligence.

original: 'phags pas rjes su gzung ba de'i don ni kun las btus pa'i mdo'i mngon par 'dod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don gyi de kho na ste /
analyzed: 'phags pas rjes su gzung ba de'i don ni kun las btus pa'i mdo'i mngon par 'dod pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don gyi de kho na ste /
translated: The meaning of the noble one's acceptance is the reality of the meaning to be expressed, which is the intended meaning of the Compendium of Abhidharma Sutra.

original: de'i gzhung 'jig rten 'dis mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gzhung 'jig rten 'dis mi shes pa'o //
translated: This world does not understand its text.

original: gang gi phyir tshig 'brel par dka' zhing mtshams sbyor gyi tshig nyung bas bshad kyang rtogs par dka' ba ni brling ba'o//
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshig 'brel par dka' zhing mtshams sbyor gyi tshig nyung bas bshad kyang rtogs par dka' ba ni brling ba'o//
translated: Because it is difficult to connect the words and few connecting words, even if explained it is difficult to understand, so it is profound.

original: yang zhes phyi dang nang gi mi shes pa'i rgyu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes phyi dang nang gi mi shes pa'i rgyu brjod pa'o //
translated: Again expresses the cause of external and internal ignorance.

original: gal te 'chad pa po brgyud pa'i man dag kyang med la //
analyzed: gal te 'chad pa po brgyud pa'i man dag kyang med la //
translated: If there is no lineage of expounders,

original: gzhung gzhan las don 'di lta bu rtogs kyang gzhung de la gzhan par mi nus na /
analyzed: gzhung gzhan las don 'di lta bu rtogs kyang gzhung de la gzhan par mi nus na /
translated: and even if one understands this meaning from other texts, one cannot rely on that text.

original: 'o na ni bshad kyang don 'di de'i 'dod pa ma yin pas ci ltar mu stegs can la 'di dag ni rtog ge shes ba ma yin no zhes de kho na nyid khong du chud pa don ma yin pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba bzhin du slob dpon la
analyzed: 'o na ni bshad kyang don 'di de'i 'dod pa ma yin pas ci ltar mu stegs can la 'di dag ni rtog ge shes ba ma yin no zhes de kho na nyid khong du chud pa don ma yin pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba bzhin du slob dpon la
translated: Well then, since this meaning is not the assertion of the tīrthikas, how is it that they are not understood to be knowers of reasoning?

original: yang ste / don ma yin pa'i rgyu ni rmongs pas mi shes par sgro 'dogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: yang ste / don ma yin pa'i rgyu ni rmongs pas mi shes par sgro 'dogs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: Just as it is for the master, since the cause of non-meaning is the superimposition of ignorance due to confusion.

original: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In response to this qualm, he says, “For whom,” and so on.

original: gang la dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs yod pa dang / dri med blo mnga' ste dri ma dang bral ba'i blo yod pa de ji ltar na don phyin ci log tu shes pa'am tshon par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang la dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs yod pa dang / dri med blo mnga' ste dri ma dang bral ba'i blo yod pa de ji ltar na don phyin ci log tu shes pa'am tshon par 'gyur te /
translated: For whom there is the cause of abundant glory, the accumulation of merit, and who has a stainless mind, who is free from stains, how could they understand the meaning in a distorted way?

original: gang la 'khrul par 'gyur ba de dag ni skal dang bral ba dang / blo gros dri ma can dag kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la 'khrul par 'gyur ba de dag ni skal dang bral ba dang / blo gros dri ma can dag kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For whom there is error, they are only bereft of good fortune and have a stained mind.

original: de yang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, who is that?

original: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du song ba'i phyir 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ring du song ba'i phyir 'phags pa ste /
translated: He is a noble one because he has gone far from sinful, nonvirtuous dharmas.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis gang la rjes su gzung ba de 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis gang la rjes su gzung ba de 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The Bhagavat Manjusri is one who is endowed with such qualities.

original: nyid ces bya ba ni sprul pa dang 'khor btang bsam yin pa'o //
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba ni sprul pa dang 'khor btang bsam yin pa'o //
translated: The word himself refers to the emanation and the retinue.

original: byon zhes bya ba ni don du ma gnyer bar ro //
analyzed: byon zhes bya ba ni don du ma gnyer bar ro //
translated: Came means that he came without being sought.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ri phug dben pa zhig na sgom pa la brtson pas gnas pa na /
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ri phug dben pa zhig na sgom pa la brtson pas gnas pa na /
translated: When the Acarya Dignaga was living in a solitary mountain cave, striving in meditation,

original: gnas skabs 'ga' zhig tu 'khor ba las yid byung nas sems can gyi don las gzhan du phyogs te /
analyzed: gnas skabs 'ga' zhig tu 'khor ba las yid byung nas sems can gyi don las gzhan du phyogs te /
translated: at one time he became disgusted with samsara and turned away from the welfare of sentient beings.

original: gcig pu @3b grol bar 'dod pa na /
analyzed: gcig pu @3b grol bar 'dod pa na /
translated: He desired to be liberated alone.

original: skad cig de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal byon nas /
analyzed: skad cig de la 'phags pa 'jam dpal byon nas /
translated: At that very moment, the noble Manjusri came.

original: bu skye bo ngan pa dang rjes su mthun par sems sngar ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur te /
analyzed: bu skye bo ngan pa dang rjes su mthun par sems sngar ba'i gzhan gyi dbang du gyur te /
translated: He said, Son, in accordance with evil people, your mind has become despondent and you have come under the power of others.

original: sems can kun la phan par nus pa'i sems yod bzhin du ci'i phyir btang snyoms su byed ces gsungs pa dang / lan du bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba ni bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal du ma dang ldan pas bsran bar mi nus la /
analyzed: sems can kun la phan par nus pa'i sems yod bzhin du ci'i phyir btang snyoms su byed ces gsungs pa dang / lan du bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba ni bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal du ma dang ldan pas bsran bar mi nus la /
translated: And in reply, he said, Blessed One, samsara is unbearable, because it is full of many sufferings that cannot be endured.

original: sems kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i skye bo la dga' bas g-yo bar spyod cing /
analyzed: sems kyang dam pa ma yin pa'i skye bo la dga' bas g-yo bar spyod cing /
translated: And the mind is fickle, because it delights in the company of vulgar people.

original: khyod mthong yang bdag la byin gyis dad ma brlabs na /
analyzed: khyod mthong yang bdag la byin gyis dad ma brlabs na /
translated: And he said, If you do not bless me with your presence,🔽what can I do about that?

original: de la ci zhig bgyir mchis zhes gsungs pa dang / lan du ci srid sa ma thob kyi bar du khyod kyi dge ba'i bshed gnyen ni nga nyid do zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: de la ci zhig bgyir mchis zhes gsungs pa dang / lan du ci srid sa ma thob kyi bar du khyod kyi dge ba'i bshed gnyen ni nga nyid do zhes gsungs te /
translated: And in reply, he said, As long as you have not attained the stages, I am your spiritual friend.

original: mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: And he disappeared.

original: de ltar na byang chub la zhugs pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas na /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub la zhugs pa dang / sems dpa' chen pos byin gyis brlabs pas na /
translated: Thus, because he was blessed by the Bodhisattva,

original: de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan par nges par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan par nges par bya'o //
translated: one should be certain that he possessed the accumulations of merit and knowledge.

original: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'dis rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu bsgrubs pas rnam par nges pa tshad ma kun las btus pa'i bshad pa'i cha gzung bar bsgrubs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa 'dis rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu bsgrubs pas rnam par nges pa tshad ma kun las btus pa'i bshad pa'i cha gzung bar bsgrubs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, this verse proves the reason for the composition of the Pramānﬁ avārtika, and so proves the composition of the section of the commentary on the Pramānﬁ asamuccaya.

original: ji ltar slob dpon gyis gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spangs bar bzhed nas tshad ma kun las btus pa'i mdo'i cha bshad pa de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar slob dpon gyis gzhan dag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spangs bar bzhed nas tshad ma kun las btus pa'i mdo'i cha bshad pa de bzhin du //
translated: Just as the master, wishing to eliminate the cause of others’ suffering, composed the section of the commentary on the Pramānﬁ asamuccaya,

original: gzhan dgag gis log pa'i shes pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spang bar 'dod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dgag gis log pa'i shes pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rgyu spang bar 'dod pa shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: in the same way, wishing to eliminate the cause of suffering, like a false cognition, he composed the Pramānﬁ avarttika in order to make others understand.

original: kha cig na re phyed gong mas rnam par nges par zlos pa'i nyes pa spangs te /
analyzed: kha cig na re phyed gong mas rnam par nges par zlos pa'i nyes pa spangs te /
translated: Some say that the first half of the verse eliminates the fault of redundancy,

original: gang gi phyir blo gros blun pos don brling ba nges par nus pa des na bzlos pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir blo gros blun pos don brling ba nges par nus pa des na bzlos pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the master, having the power to understand the profound meaning, does not have the fault of redundancy.🔽The second half of the verse eliminates the fault of circularity.

original: phyed 'og mas kyang rang rgyud nyid spangs so zhes zer ba de ni shin tu ma 'brel te /
analyzed: phyed 'og mas kyang rang rgyud nyid spangs so zhes zer ba de ni shin tu ma 'brel te /
translated: This is a very loose interpretation.

original: brtse bas kyang zhes bsdu ba med pa'i phyir dang / rnam 'grel du bya bar bsgrubs pas kyang zlos ba'i nyes pa spangs ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brtse bas kyang zhes bsdu ba med pa'i phyir dang / rnam 'grel du bya bar bsgrubs pas kyang zlos ba'i nyes pa spangs ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: and also because of the absence of the inclusive term “and,” and because the fault of redundancy is avoided by the proof of the purpose in the Pramānﬁ avārtika.

original: gang yang 'di ni rnam par nges pa'i dgos pa yin no zhes zer ba de ni sdigs pa bas kyang sdig pa yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ni rnam par nges pa'i dgos pa yin no zhes zer ba de ni sdigs pa bas kyang sdig pa yin te /
translated: And also, that which is said to be the purpose of the ascertainment is a greater fault than the fault of redundancy.

original: rnam par nges pa'i dgos pa ni gang gi dbang du byas nas 'di byed pas /
analyzed: rnam par nges pa'i dgos pa ni gang gi dbang du byas nas 'di byed pas /
translated: For, the purpose of the ascertainment is that with respect to which this is done.

original: brjod par bya ba rtogs pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba rtogs pa nyid yin la /
translated: And that which is to be expressed is the ascertainment itself.

original: de yang gzhan gyis bsgrub zin pa de ma na de'i don du des @4a * //
analyzed: de yang gzhan gyis bsgrub zin pa de ma na de'i don du des @4a * //
translated: And that has already been accomplished by another. Therefore, it is not to be done for that purpose.

original: yang de bya ba ma yin no zhes dgos pa med pa nyid du dgos par 'gyur ba de yang rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu bstan pa nyid kyis spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang de bya ba ma yin no zhes dgos pa med pa nyid du dgos par 'gyur ba de yang rnam 'grel du byed pa'i rgyu bstan pa nyid kyis spangs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the purpose would be purposeless. And that is avoided in the Pramānﬁ avārtika by the very teaching of the purpose of composition.

original: ci ste rang rgyud brnyas pa'i rgyu yin pas kun las btus pas bshad par byed pa rnam par nges pa brtsam par bya ba nyid kyi dgos pa ci zhig yin /
analyzed: ci ste rang rgyud brnyas pa'i rgyu yin pas kun las btus pas bshad par byed pa rnam par nges pa brtsam par bya ba nyid kyi dgos pa ci zhig yin /
translated: But since the autocommentary is the cause of contempt for the autocommentary, what is the purpose of composing the Ascertainment of Valid Knowledge, which explains the Compendium of Valid Knowledge?

original: tshigs tshad ma ma yin pas dgos dad pa bstan kyang bstan bcos mnyan pa nyid las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshigs tshad ma ma yin pas dgos dad pa bstan kyang bstan bcos mnyan pa nyid las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Since it is not a verse, even if it teaches the purpose, is it not to be ascertained from just listening to the treatise?

original: 'dir dgos pa ston pa'i ngag gis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir dgos pa ston pa'i ngag gis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of stating the purpose here?

original: bden te de ltar na yang tshigs las rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams the tshom skye zhing /
analyzed: bden te de ltar na yang tshigs las rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams the tshom skye zhing /
translated: Although that is true, still doubts arise for those who are conceptual due to verses.

original: des na don du gnyer la /
analyzed: des na don du gnyer la /
translated: Therefore, it is for those who are interested in the purpose.

original: de las kyang 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las kyang 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And also for those who will engage in it.

original: brjod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag med na ni 'de'i brjod par bya ba ni bya rog gi so bstan pa bzhin du 'bras bu med par dogs pa'am /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag med na ni 'de'i brjod par bya ba ni bya rog gi so bstan pa bzhin du 'bras bu med par dogs pa'am /
translated: If there is no statement of the topic and so on, then like the crow's tooth, it is suspected to be fruitless.

original: mtha' yas kyi gtsug gi nad thams cad sel ba'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi man ngag bzhin du yod kyang bsgrub par mi nus pa'am //
analyzed: mtha' yas kyi gtsug gi nad thams cad sel ba'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi man ngag bzhin du yod kyang bsgrub par mi nus pa'am //
translated: It is like the case of the jewel ornament that cures all the illnesses of the crown prince Ananta, but one is unable to obtain it.

original: ma bag mar len pa'i man nga bzhin du 'di nyan pa'i dgos pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ma yin no zhes sogs pa'am /
analyzed: ma bag mar len pa'i man nga bzhin du 'di nyan pa'i dgos pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ma yin no zhes sogs pa'am /
translated: Or it is like the case of the instruction for taking a maiden as one's wife, but one has no desire to listen to it.

original: bstan bcos mnyan pa de bas kyang dgos pa de 'grub pa'i thabs sla ba gzhan yod do zhes don med pa'i the tshom gang yang rung bas kyang don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan bcos mnyan pa de bas kyang dgos pa de 'grub pa'i thabs sla ba gzhan yod do zhes don med pa'i the tshom gang yang rung bas kyang don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or it is like the case of the thought that there is another easier means of accomplishing that purpose than listening to the treatise.

original: des na mnyan pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na mnyan pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one does not engage in listening.

original: 'brel pa la sogs pa brjod na ni don la the tshom bya bar rigs te /
analyzed: 'brel pa la sogs pa brjod na ni don la the tshom bya bar rigs te /
translated: But if one expresses the connection and so on, it is appropriate to doubt the purpose,

original: bstan bcos byed pas bstan bcos kyi dang por brjod par bya ba la sogs pa phyin ci log tu ston ba la dgos pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pas bstan bcos kyi dang por brjod par bya ba la sogs pa phyin ci log tu ston ba la dgos pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is not the slightest purpose in the treatise author's teaching the connection and so on in a distorted way at the beginning of the treatise.

original: de'i phyir dgos pa'i ngag bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dgos pa'i ngag bkod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement of the purpose is made.

original: 'chad pa po rnam ni brtse ba la sogs pa'i don du log par ston pa srid kyi //
analyzed: 'chad pa po rnam ni brtse ba la sogs pa'i don du log par ston pa srid kyi //
translated: The expounders, however, may be mistaken in their affection, etc., and so forth.

original: bstan bcos byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the author of the treatise is not.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yan lag tu don du 'gyur ba nyid kyi the tshom bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i yan lag tu don du 'gyur ba nyid kyi the tshom bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to generate doubt about the purpose of the treatise,

original: phan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dang por brjod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag gsungs so //
analyzed: phan pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas dang por brjod par bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag gsungs so //
translated: he states the purpose, etc., at the beginning with the words “for the sake of benefit and happiness.

original: gang 'dis kyang brjod par bya ba'i dgos pa nyid ston to //
analyzed: gang 'dis kyang brjod par bya ba'i dgos pa nyid ston to //
translated: ” And this also shows the purpose of the subject matter.

original: dag gi rang bzhin 'di thams cad ni sgra'i lus dang don gyi lus so //
analyzed: dag gi rang bzhin 'di thams cad ni sgra'i lus dang don gyi lus so //
translated: The nature of the treatise is twofold: the body of words and the body of meaning.

original: de la sgra'i cha ni don rtogs @4b pa nyid dgos pa yin pas /
analyzed: de la sgra'i cha ni don rtogs @4b pa nyid dgos pa yin pas /
translated: Of these, the verbal part is the means of understanding the meaning.

original: 'ga' zhig tu yang 'bras bu med pa ma yin par rang nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu yang 'bras bu med pa ma yin par rang nyid kyis 'gyur ro //
translated: So it is not without result, even if it is not the main thing.

original: don gyi cha la ni don dang mi ldan pa nyid mthong la /
analyzed: don gyi cha la ni don dang mi ldan pa nyid mthong la /
translated: But the meaningful part is seen to be meaningless.

original: de lta bu'i don kyang brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i don kyang brtsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: And such a meaning is not the subject matter of the treatise.

original: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa thams cad ni dgos pas khyab pa'i phyir dang ; skyes bu'i don la nye bar mkho ba'i don kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i rtsom pa thams cad ni dgos pas khyab pa'i phyir dang ; skyes bu'i don la nye bar mkho ba'i don kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all compositions that are conceptual are pervaded by a purpose, and because there is no purpose that is necessary for human aims.

original: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsams pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ston par byed pas //
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan bcos brtsams pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa ston par byed pas //
translated: Therefore, the author of the treatise shows that the composition is fruitful.

original: brjod par bya ba'i dgos pa nyid bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i dgos pa nyid bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: The purpose of the subject matter should be stated.

original: gang gi phyir phan pa dang mi phan pa thob pa dang spang ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de bstan pa'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: gang gi phyir phan pa dang mi phan pa thob pa dang spang ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir de bstan pa'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya ba la //
translated: Since the attainment and avoidance of benefit and harm are the results of right knowledge, this is composed for the sake of teaching that.

original: 'dir yang don gyis brjod pas brjod par bya ba dang / byed pa dang nyan pa'i bya ba'i dgos pa dang 'brel pa dag kyang brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang don gyis brjod pas brjod par bya ba dang / byed pa dang nyan pa'i bya ba'i dgos pa dang 'brel pa dag kyang brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, by the expression of the meaning, the purpose of the subject matter, the activity, and the hearing are also expressed, as they are related.

original: don gyis brjod pa de yang dag gi cha'i dbye ba brtags pa 'ba' zhig gis ston te /
analyzed: don gyis brjod pa de yang dag gi cha'i dbye ba brtags pa 'ba' zhig gis ston te /
translated: And that expression of the meaning is shown by merely investigating the divisions of the correct part.

original: de zhes bya bas ni brjod par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: de zhes bya bas ni brjod par bya ba bstan to //
translated: The word “this” indicates the subject matter.

original: bstan pa zhas bya ba ni dgos ba ste /
analyzed: bstan pa zhas bya ba ni dgos ba ste /
translated: The word “teaching” indicates the purpose.

original: ngag gcig gis don du ma rang dbang du ma rang dbang du 'jog mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gcig gis don du ma rang dbang du ma rang dbang du 'jog mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one cannot establish many meanings independently with a single statement.

original: phan pa ni 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa ni 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Beneficial means accomplishing what is desired.

original: de las bzlog pa ni mi phan pa ste /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni mi phan pa ste /
translated: Harmful is the opposite of that.

original: 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang / mi 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa dang / mi 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: It is not accomplishing what is desired and accomplishing what is not desired.

original: de dag nyid blang ba dang spangs bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag nyid blang ba dang spangs bar bya ba yin la /
translated: Those are what should be accepted and rejected.

original: btang snyoms su bya ba yang dor bar bya ba nyid kyis spang bar bya ba kho na yin pa'i phyir mi phan pa yin te /
analyzed: btang snyoms su bya ba yang dor bar bya ba nyid kyis spang bar bya ba kho na yin pa'i phyir mi phan pa yin te /
translated: Neutral is also harmful because it is to be rejected by abandoning what should be abandoned.

original: de'i phyir 'di dag las rnam pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag las rnam pa gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no other type besides these.

original: 'di dag nyid don du gnyer ba'i skyes bus spong ba dang blang bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu'i don te /
analyzed: 'di dag nyid don du gnyer ba'i skyes bus spong ba dang blang bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu'i don te /
translated: These are the aims of a person because they are what a person who seeks them should abandon and accept.

original: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa yang yin no //
translated: They are also what is desired and what is not desired.

original: 'on kyang 'jig rten na gal te 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa la yang mi phan par grags pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig rten na gal te 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa la yang mi phan par grags pa de lta na yang /
translated: But in the world, even if something is not known to be useful for accomplishing what is desired,

original: 'dir ni 'di lta bu nyid la phan pa dang mi phan par 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di lta bu nyid la phan pa dang mi phan par 'dod do //
translated: here, it is just that which is considered useful or not useful.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu 'dod pas de'i sgrub par byed pa la shes nas 'jug la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu 'dod pas de'i sgrub par byed pa la shes nas 'jug la /
translated: Because, desiring the effect, one engages in the means of accomplishing it after knowing it.

original: 'bras bu yang 'dod pa nyid yin te 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin no zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu yang 'dod pa nyid yin te 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'dod pa yin no zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: And the effect is also desired, for the characteristic of the effect is desire, as will be explained.

original: sgrub par byed pa de yang @5a * //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de yang @5a * //
translated: And that means of accomplishment

original: nges pa yin te /
analyzed: nges pa yin te /
translated: is certain.

original: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa len par 'dod pa don du gnyer bas sgrub par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa shes nas sgrub par byed pa len pa dang // sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa spong ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrub par byed pa len par 'dod pa don du gnyer bas sgrub par byed pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa shes nas sgrub par byed pa len pa dang // sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa spong ba la 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, one who desires to take up the means of accomplishment, seeking the goal, knowing the means of accomplishment and what is not the means of accomplishment, engages in taking up the means of accomplishment and abandoning what is not the means of accomplishment.

original: de'i phyir don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spang ba dang blang ba'i don du shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i 'jug pa dang gang yin pa de dag ni shes par byas nas spang ba dang blang ba'i dngos po la 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spang ba dang blang ba'i don du shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i 'jug pa dang gang yin pa de dag ni shes par byas nas spang ba dang blang ba'i dngos po la 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, those who seek the goal, having understood what is to be undertaken and what is not to be undertaken, engage in the process of abandoning and adopting.

original: 'dir ni 'dod pa bsgrub par byed pa dang // sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa tsam zhig phan pa dang mi phan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'dod pa bsgrub par byed pa dang // sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa tsam zhig phan pa dang mi phan pa yin no //
translated: Here, what is beneficial and what is not beneficial is simply what accomplishes what is desired and what does not accomplish it.

original: des na 'di skad du sgrub par byed pa ma nges pas 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa /
analyzed: des na 'di skad du sgrub par byed pa ma nges pas 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa /
translated: Thus, it is said that one does not grasp due to the uncertainty of accomplishment, and so on.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa thob pa dang spang bar bya ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa las so zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi sgrub par byed pa thob pa dang spang bar bya ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa las so zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: What is to be attained and what is to be abandoned in the accomplishment of what is desired and what is not desired, happiness and suffering, is explained as arising from right knowledge.

original: de dag las thob pa ni phan ba len pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las thob pa ni phan ba len pa'o //
translated: Attaining it is taking what is beneficial.

original: spong ba ni mi phan pa spong ba'o //
analyzed: spong ba ni mi phan pa spong ba'o //
translated: Abandoning it is abandoning what is not beneficial.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ni rgyu yin pas shes pa 'bras bu'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ni rgyu yin pas shes pa 'bras bu'i sngon du 'gro ba yin no //
translated: Since the cause is the prior cognition, cognition is prior to the result.

original: sngon du 'gro ba brjod pas ni bstan par 'os pa nyid brjod do //
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba brjod pas ni bstan par 'os pa nyid brjod do //
translated: By stating the prior cognition, he states the suitability of the teaching.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa ni gnyis te /
translated: Correct cognition is twofold:

original: gcig ni 'dod pa thob pa'i rang bzhin don byed par snang ba yin la /
analyzed: gcig ni 'dod pa thob pa'i rang bzhin don byed par snang ba yin la /
translated: One is the appearance of the nature of the attainment of the desired object.

original: de yang dbyed par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang dbyed par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: And that is not to be analyzed,

original: 'di ltar cung zad rnam par dpyod pa ni 'di ni spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar cung zad rnam par dpyod pa ni 'di ni spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: because if one analyzes it even slightly, it is taught that this is to be abandoned

original: 'di ni blang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni blang bar bya ba'o //
translated: and this is to be adopted.

original: zhes bstan pa'i don du yin na de lta bu ni thams cad kyang don du gnyer ba rnams kyis blang bar bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa'i don du yin na de lta bu ni thams cad kyang don du gnyer ba rnams kyis blang bar bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: But if that is the case, then all of it is only to be adopted by those who seek the goal.

original: gzhan ni sgrub par byed par snang ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni sgrub par byed par snang ba'o //
translated: The other appears as the means of establishing.

original: gang gi yul la 'jug par 'dod pa slu bar dogs pa rnams kyis de la tshad ma'am tshad ma yin par dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang gi yul la 'jug par 'dod pa slu bar dogs pa rnams kyis de la tshad ma'am tshad ma yin par dpyad par bya ba yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Those who doubt whether the object to which they wish to engage is deceptive should examine whether it is valid cognition or not.

original: bstan bcos las bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos las bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is taught in the treatise.

original: gang gi phyir 'jug par byed pa thams cad ni bar du chod pa'i rgyu yin pas gags byed pa srid pa yin no//
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jug par byed pa thams cad ni bar du chod pa'i rgyu yin pas gags byed pa srid pa yin no//
translated: Because all instigators are obstructed causes, it is possible that they are obstructed.

original: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, because it is a branch of instigation,

original: sngon du 'gro ba tsam yin gyi de ma thag pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba tsam yin gyi de ma thag pa'i rgyu ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: it is merely a preliminary, not an immediately preceding condition.🔽Just as the seed of the element of earth is not the cause of the sprout everywhere, like a pot, it is said that the capacity is negated.

original: ci ltar sbyang na gnas pa'i sa bon de ni bum pa bzhin du thams cad du myu gu'i rgyu nyid @5b ma yin no zhes nus pa med pa nyid bzlog pa de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ni log pa'i shes pa bzhin du don thob pa'i
analyzed: ci ltar sbyang na gnas pa'i sa bon de ni bum pa bzhin du thams cad du myu gu'i rgyu nyid @5b ma yin no zhes nus pa med pa nyid bzlog pa de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes pa'i ni log pa'i shes pa bzhin du don thob pa'i
translated: In the same way, correct knowledge is not the cause of the attainment of the object, like false knowledge.

original: rgyu ma yin pas rgyur brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pas rgyur brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is called a cause.

original: gal te phan pa thob pa dang spong ba ni gzhan la skyang 'gyur ba ma yin nam //
analyzed: gal te phan pa thob pa dang spong ba ni gzhan la skyang 'gyur ba ma yin nam //
translated: Isn't the attainment of benefit and abandonment for another?

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa de la su zhig gus par byed ces dogs pa las gzhan las gzhan las thob pa dang spong ba dgag pa'i phyir nges par zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa de la su zhig gus par byed ces dogs pa las gzhan las gzhan las thob pa dang spong ba dgag pa'i phyir nges par zhes gsungs te /
translated: In order to refute that it is obtained from another or that it is abandoned, he says: definitely.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na las 'gyur gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na las 'gyur gyi gzhan las ni ma yin no //
translated: It comes from right knowledge alone, not from another.

original: don thob par byed pa ni nges pa kho na ste //
analyzed: don thob par byed pa ni nges pa kho na ste //
translated: It is only right knowledge that obtains the object.

original: gzhan ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin la /
translated: It is not another.

original: don thob par byed pa'i nges pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: don thob par byed pa'i nges pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na yin no //
translated: And the right knowledge that obtains the object is only right knowledge.

original: the tshom gyi shes pa yang yod dam med /
analyzed: the tshom gyi shes pa yang yod dam med /
translated: Is there a doubting cognition?

original: bum pa'am snam bu zhes gnyi ga'i cha la dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: bum pa'am snam bu zhes gnyi ga'i cha la dmigs pa yin la /
translated: It observes both aspects, pot and cloth.

original: gang zhig thob par bya ba gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig thob par bya ba gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no entity that is the nature of both to be obtained.

original: khyim na 'dug pa na khrod pa na chu yod do zhes gcig gi char zhen par byed kyang /
analyzed: khyim na 'dug pa na khrod pa na chu yod do zhes gcig gi char zhen par byed kyang /
translated: When one is at home, one may cling to the part that there is water in the forest,🔽but when one goes to the forest, one clings to the part that there is no water.

original: nges par byed pa'i rgyu med pas chu med pa'i dogs pa ma bzlog pa'i phyir shes pa de ni the tshom kho na'o //
analyzed: nges par byed pa'i rgyu med pas chu med pa'i dogs pa ma bzlog pa'i phyir shes pa de ni the tshom kho na'o //
translated: Because there is no cause for certainty, the apprehension of fire is only a doubt, since the doubt about the absence of water is not eliminated.

original: gang yang rgyu mtshan med par me'i steng du sbrang bu'i tshogs 'dus pa la du bar nges pa las yang dag pa'i me nges pa de yang ngo //
analyzed: gang yang rgyu mtshan med par me'i steng du sbrang bu'i tshogs 'dus pa la du bar nges pa las yang dag pa'i me nges pa de yang ngo //
translated: Also, when a group of flies gathers on a fire without a cause, the ascertainment of smoke from that is also a doubt about fire.

original: sbrang bu'i tshogs mthong ba lta zhog ste /
analyzed: sbrang bu'i tshogs mthong ba lta zhog ste /
translated: Let alone seeing a group of flies,

original: bden pa'i du ba mthong yang rjes su dpag pa'i dus kyi snga rol du sbrang bu'i tshogs la sogs pa las log pa'i du ba'i rang bzhin nges pa ma rtogs shing /
analyzed: bden pa'i du ba mthong yang rjes su dpag pa'i dus kyi snga rol du sbrang bu'i tshogs la sogs pa las log pa'i du ba'i rang bzhin nges pa ma rtogs shing /
translated: even when seeing real smoke, before the time of inference, the nature of smoke that is the opposite of a group of flies and so on is not realized.

original: ci srid rnams par ma phye ba de srid du me'i 'bras bur the tshom za ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ci srid rnams par ma phye ba de srid du me'i 'bras bur the tshom za ba'i phyir /
translated: As long as it is not distinguished, there is doubt about whether it is the result of fire.

original: the tshom du gyur pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore it is only a doubt.

original: du ba'i bye brag gi rang bzhin nges pa rnam par phyir zin kyang de'i dus na mi dran pa yin te /
analyzed: du ba'i bye brag gi rang bzhin nges pa rnam par phyir zin kyang de'i dus na mi dran pa yin te /
translated: Even if the nature of a particular smoke is ascertained, at that time it is not remembered.

original: dran na 'khrul par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran na 'khrul par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it were remembered, it would be illogical for there to be error.

original: me'i 'bras bur nges pa'i rang bzhin mi dran na yang dgos pa'i rgyu ma log pas sems dang ldan na ci ltar the tshom za bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: me'i 'bras bur nges pa'i rang bzhin mi dran na yang dgos pa'i rgyu ma log pas sems dang ldan na ci ltar the tshom za bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Even if one does not recall the nature of smoke that is ascertained as the effect of fire, if one has a mind that is not devoid of the need for ascertaining the nature of smoke, how could one not have doubt?

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin nges pa gtan la phebs pa'i du ba kho na las me rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin nges pa gtan la phebs pa'i du ba kho na las me rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one would understand fire only from smoke, which is ascertained as having a nature that is ascertained.

original: gzhan las ni cha gcig gtu gzung yang //
analyzed: gzhan las ni cha gcig gtu gzung yang //
translated: Even if one were to apprehend one part of the definition,

original: the tshom gyi rgyu ma log pas the tshom nyid yin no //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu ma log pas the tshom nyid yin no //
translated: one would still have doubt because the cause of doubt would not have been eliminated.

original: des na thob pa dang spong ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na las @6a * //
analyzed: des na thob pa dang spong ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa kho na las @6a * //
translated: Therefore, attainment and abandonment are due to right knowledge alone.

original: yin no // tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yod na yang /
analyzed: yin no // tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yod na yang /
translated: Even if the definition of valid knowledge exists,

original: rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i shes pa la /
analyzed: rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i shes pa la /
translated: in the case of a cognition that is engaged in the object,

original: de las bshad pa'i tshad ma ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar /
analyzed: de las bshad pa'i tshad ma ni 'di yin no zhes bya bar /
translated: it is not ascertained by the statement of the definition, “This is valid knowledge.”

original: don byed pa'i shes pa la sogs pa tha snyad kho na las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: don byed pa'i shes pa la sogs pa tha snyad kho na las nges par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it that valid knowledge is ascertained only from the conventional, such as the cognition that engages its object?

original: de ltar na yang mtshan nyid med kyang tha snyad kho na las rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na yang mtshan nyid med kyang tha snyad kho na las rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Even so, it is understood only from the conventional, even though the definition does not exist.

original: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid ces gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad las ni tshad ma nyid ces gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: The passage is saying that valid cognition is conventional.

original: tha snyad las mi 'grub pa don dam pa'i tshad ma ni bshad par bya ba'i gtso bo ma yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad las mi 'grub pa don dam pa'i tshad ma ni bshad par bya ba'i gtso bo ma yin te /
translated: The primary topic of the passage is not the establishment of ultimate valid cognition by means of the conventional,

original: 'di ni kun du tha snyad ba'i chad ma'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ni kun du tha snyad ba'i chad ma'i rang bzhin brjod pa yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes dogs pa la /
translated: because it will be explained that the passage is describing the nature of the conventional.

original: mi mkhas pa rnams la zhes smos te /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa rnams la zhes smos te /
translated: To respond to this, the root text says, “for the unwise.”

original: mi mkhas pa de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i don la yang gzhan du zhen par mthong ste /
analyzed: mi mkhas pa de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i don la yang gzhan du zhen par mthong ste /
translated: The unwise are seen to cling to otherness even in regard to the object of experience.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: khyab pa med dang ldog pa dag / spong ba'i don du zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: khyab pa med dang ldog pa dag / spong ba'i don du zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: “For the sake of eliminating the absence of pervasion and the reversal.”

original: bstan bcos ni de dag la yin gyi mkhas pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: bstan bcos ni de dag la yin gyi mkhas pa la ma yin te /
translated: The treatise is for the unwise, not for the wise,

original: de dag ni tha snyad kho nas nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni tha snyad kho nas nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the latter are certain about the conventional.

original: de lta na yang mtshan nyid mi shes pa'i shing rta 'dren pa yang bstan bcos shes pa dang mtshungs par don byed pa grub pa nyams pa med pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta na yang mtshan nyid mi shes pa'i shing rta 'dren pa yang bstan bcos shes pa dang mtshungs par don byed pa grub pa nyams pa med pa ma yin nam /
translated: But if that is so, then the function of the treatise is not to eliminate the error of those who do not know the definition of a chariot, since it is the same as the function of one who knows the treatise.

original: de dag la yang bstan pas ci zhig bya zhe na ;
analyzed: de dag la yang bstan pas ci zhig bya zhe na ;
translated: What is the use of teaching them?

original: don thob pa bye brag med pa bden na yang mthong ba'i tshad ma la rmongs pas ma mthong ba la yang 'phel bar byed pa de bas na bstan bcos ni rmongs pa bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: don thob pa bye brag med pa bden na yang mthong ba'i tshad ma la rmongs pas ma mthong ba la yang 'phel bar byed pa de bas na bstan bcos ni rmongs pa bzlog pa yin no //
translated: Even though there is no difference in the attainment of the goal, still, because of delusion about the valid cognition of perception, one who has not seen the treatise will not be able to increase his understanding. Therefore, the treatise is for the purpose of eliminating delusion.

original: mthong ba la yang tshad ma la rmongs pas tshad ma ma yin pa la 'jug na bslus par 'gyur ba yin te dper na 'di ni sngo bsangs yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba la yang tshad ma la rmongs pas tshad ma ma yin pa la 'jug na bslus par 'gyur ba yin te dper na 'di ni sngo bsangs yin te /
translated: Even one who has seen the treatise may be deluded about valid cognition and engage in invalid cognition, and so be deceived. For example, one may say, “This is a healthy person,

original: de'i bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: de'i bu yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: because he is the son of a healthy person.”

original: des na bstan bcos ni mthong ba'i rmongs pa yang zlog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na bstan bcos ni mthong ba'i rmongs pa yang zlog par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the treatise is for the purpose of eliminating delusion about what one has seen.

original: de zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to right knowledge.

original: bsdu ba'i don la gtsor gyur pa ma yin pas gzung bar mi nus pa de ltar na yang bstan bcos la gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsdu ba'i don la gtsor gyur pa ma yin pas gzung bar mi nus pa de ltar na yang bstan bcos la gtso bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Although the meaning of the treatise is not the primary object of comprehension, since it is not possible to comprehend it without comprehending the meaning of the words,

original: blo gzhan gyis rang dbang du rtogs pas 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: blo gzhan gyis rang dbang du rtogs pas 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: one comprehends the treatise by comprehending the words, since the treatise is the primary object of comprehension.

original: dper na 'di gang gi khyim yin pa de khrid de shog cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'di gang gi khyim yin pa de khrid de shog cig ces bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, one is told, “Bring the one whose house this is.”

original: bstan pa'i don de dgos pa gang la yod pa de ni de'i don to //
analyzed: bstan pa'i don de dgos pa gang la yod pa de ni de'i don to //
translated: The purpose of the treatise is the purpose of the meaning of the treatise.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: @6b byed pa po la ltos nas ni byed par rtsom la /
analyzed: @6b byed pa po la ltos nas ni byed par rtsom la /
translated: The author composes the treatise in order to explain the meaning of the treatise to the listener.

original: nyan pa po la ltos nas ni nyan par rtsom zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: nyan pa po la ltos nas ni nyan par rtsom zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The listener listens to the treatise in order to understand the meaning of the treatise.

original: yang dag ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir /🔽bdag gis yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan par bya'o zhes bstan bcos byed la /
analyzed: yang dag ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir / bdag gis yang dag pa'i shes pa bstan par bya'o zhes bstan bcos byed la /
translated: The author composes the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in the listener.🔽The listener listens to the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in himself.🔽The author composes the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in the listener.🔽The listener listens to the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in himself.🔽The author composes the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in the listener.🔽The listener listens to the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in himself.🔽The author composes the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in the listener.🔽The listener listens to the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in himself.🔽The author composes the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in the listener.

original: slob ma rnams kyis slob dpon gyis bdag cag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes des byas pa'i bstan bcos nyan par byed de /
analyzed: slob ma rnams kyis slob dpon gyis bdag cag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes des byas pa'i bstan bcos nyan par byed de /
translated: The listener listens to the treatise in order to generate correct knowledge in himself.

original: de ltar na yang byed pa po byed pa'i dgos pa dang / nyan pa po rnams kyi nyan pa'i dgos pa bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang byed pa po byed pa'i dgos pa dang / nyan pa po rnams kyi nyan pa'i dgos pa bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the purpose of the author's composition and the purpose of the listener's hearing are explained.

original: shes pa la gnas pa'i don gzhan la ston par 'dod pas /
analyzed: shes pa la gnas pa'i don gzhan la ston par 'dod pas /
translated: One who wishes to teach the meaning that is the basis of knowledge🔽to others should explain the purpose of the treatise.

original: gzhan du na don de pha rol la bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir de bsnyad par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan du na don de pha rol la bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir de bsnyad par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Otherwise, since one would be unable to establish that meaning for others, it would not be worth explaining.

original: de ltar na 'dir mtshan nyid byed pa nyid ston pa po'i bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir mtshan nyid byed pa nyid ston pa po'i bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, here the characteristic of the author's activity is the act of teaching.

original: de'i phyir bstan pa ni bstan bcos byed pa yin pa des na 'di nyid bya ba'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i phyir bstan pa ni bstan bcos byed pa yin pa des na 'di nyid bya ba'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya bar 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, since the teaching is the activity of the treatise author, it would follow that this is composed for the sake of that activity.

original: de'ang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'ang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is also unreasonable.

original: 'di byed pa dang nyan pa ni tshad ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di byed pa dang nyan pa ni tshad ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: The composition and hearing of this is for the sake of understanding valid knowledge,

original: 'di nyid byed pa'i don du ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid byed pa'i don du ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not for the sake of the activity of this.

original: sgra'i bya ba gtsor bya ba la ltos na ni skyon 'di yod pa bden te /
analyzed: sgra'i bya ba gtsor bya ba la ltos na ni skyon 'di yod pa bden te /
translated: If one relies on the primary activity of sound, this fault is true.

original: gang gi phyir sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i gtso bo ni rtogs pa'i yul can gyi ston pa po'i bya ba yin pa des na de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra'i brjod par bya ba'i gtso bo ni rtogs pa'i yul can gyi ston pa po'i bya ba yin pa des na de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the primary object of expression of the word is the act of the speaker who is the subject of the cognition, it is understood in that way.

original: don gtso bor byas na skyon yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don gtso bor byas na skyon yod pa ma yin te /
translated: If the meaning is taken as primary, there is no fault,

original: gang gi phyir ston pa po'i rtsom pa 'di thams cad ni bstan par bya ba'i don du yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ston pa po'i rtsom pa 'di thams cad ni bstan par bya ba'i don du yin te /
translated: because all of this composition by the teacher is for the purpose of the meaning to be taught.

original: 'tshed pa'i sgra la 'tshed pa'i bya ba gtso bo ma yin zhing tshos pa gtso bo yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'tshed pa'i sgra la 'tshed pa'i bya ba gtso bo ma yin zhing tshos pa gtso bo yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: Just as it is explained that in the word cooking, the act of cooking is not primary, but cooking is primary.

original: de'i phyir 'chad pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa las rtogs pa yod pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'chad pa'i bya ba dang ldan pa las rtogs pa yod pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that understanding exists from the act of explanation.

original: de rtogs pa'i don du zhes brjod na ni zas la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi de'i don gzhan dang thun mong ba de'i dan tsam zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rtogs pa'i don du zhes brjod na ni zas la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi de'i don gzhan dang thun mong ba de'i dan tsam zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is said for the purpose of understanding that, it would be said that the mere meaning of that, which is shared with other meanings in the context of food, etc.,

original: da ltar ni don 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: da ltar ni don 'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Now, this meaning is understood in this way.

original: 'di byas pa las na slob dpon ni ston pa po yin la /
analyzed: 'di byas pa las na slob dpon ni ston pa po yin la /
translated: Since this is the case, the master is the teacher,

original: nyan par byed pa rtogs pa po ni bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: nyan par byed pa rtogs pa po ni bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: and the listener, the one who understands, is the one to be taught.

original: de ltar 'di byas pa dang nyan pa ni ston pa po'i bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas don rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar 'di byas pa dang nyan pa ni ston pa po'i bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas don rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, the listener, having been empowered by the activity of the teacher, understands the meaning,

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no//
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no//
translated: but not otherwise.

original: @7a * // de'i phyir 'doms par byed pa ni ston pa po yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @7a * // de'i phyir 'doms par byed pa ni ston pa po yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the one who instructs is the teacher.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni nang gi de kho na nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa don gyi bdag nyid kyi bstan bcos gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni nang gi de kho na nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa don gyi bdag nyid kyi bstan bcos gzung ngo //
translated: This refers to the treatise which is complete within, i.e., the reality of the ultimate reality, the nature of the object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dgos pa 'di ni rnam par nges pa kho na'i yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dgos pa 'di ni rnam par nges pa kho na'i yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the purpose of the ascertainment,

original: kun las btus pa'i ni dngos su ma yin no //
analyzed: kun las btus pa'i ni dngos su ma yin no //
translated: but not of the Compendium of Abhidharma.

original: mdo dang rnam 'grel dag dgos pa gcig pa'i phyir de'i yang dgos pa 'di yin par don gyis brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo dang rnam 'grel dag dgos pa gcig pa'i phyir de'i yang dgos pa 'di yin par don gyis brjod pa yin no //
translated: Since the sutra and the commentary have the same purpose, the purpose of the latter is implicitly stated to be this.

original: phyi rol gyi de kho na nyid sgra'i bdag nyid kyis ni byed par rtsom la /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi de kho na nyid sgra'i bdag nyid kyis ni byed par rtsom la /
translated: The external reality, in the form of sound, is the subject matter.

original: thams cad kyi bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs pa las ni nyan par rtsom pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag nyid yongs su rdzogs pa las ni nyan par rtsom pa yin no //
translated: The complete form of the reality is the object of listening.

original: brtsam mo zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dus te /
analyzed: brtsam mo zhes bya ba ni da ltar gyi dus te /
translated: The present tense, “is composed,”

original: nyan pa dang 'chad par rtsom pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar gyi yul lo //
analyzed: nyan pa dang 'chad par rtsom pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar gyi yul lo //
translated: indicates the object of listening and explaining, up to the completion of the composition.

original: 'dir yang de zhes bya bas brjod par bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: 'dir yang de zhes bya bas brjod par bya ba bstan te /
translated: Here, the word “this” indicates the subject matter.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par mi nus par dogs pa spangs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par mi nus par dogs pa spangs so //
translated: Therefore, the doubt that it cannot be accomplished is removed.

original: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa ste /
analyzed: bstan pa zhes bya ba ni dgos pa ste /
translated: The word “teaching” indicates the purpose.

original: de'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa ma yin par dogs pa bsal to //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par 'dod pa ma yin par dogs pa bsal to //
translated: Therefore, the doubt that it is not desired is removed.

original: de'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya bas kyang sgra'i bdag nyid kyi bstan bcos 'di dang dgos pa thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa brjod de /
analyzed: de'i don du 'di brtsam mo zhes bya bas kyang sgra'i bdag nyid kyi bstan bcos 'di dang dgos pa thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa brjod de /
translated: The words “for that purpose, this is composed” indicate the connection between the treatise in the form of sound and the purpose, which is characterized by the means and the result that arises from the means.

original: de'i phyir thabs gzhan yod par dogs pa bsal te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs gzhan yod par dogs pa bsal te /
translated: Therefore, the doubt that there is another means is removed.

original: gal te 'di bas kyang sla ba'i thabs gzhan yod na ni 'di brtsam par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di bas kyang sla ba'i thabs gzhan yod na ni 'di brtsam par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were another method easier than this, then this would not be undertaken.

original: de ltar rtog pa dang ldan par 'jug pa'i yan lag tu don yod par the tshom za ba'i rgyur brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa dang ldan par 'jug pa'i yan lag tu don yod par the tshom za ba'i rgyur brjod par bya ba la sogs pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the cause of doubt about the meaningfulness of the branches of engagement that are endowed with such investigation,

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa skabs rtsom par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa skabs rtsom par byed pa yin no //
translated: he begins the section on right knowledge, etc.

original: log par rtogs pa bsal nas de kho na nyid brjod pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: log par rtogs pa bsal nas de kho na nyid brjod pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The teaching of the refutation of wrong understanding and the expression of reality is as follows.

original: log par rtogs pa yang /
analyzed: log par rtogs pa yang /
translated: The wrong understanding is

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i grangs dang mtshan nyid dang / spyod yul dang 'bras bu'i yul lo //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i grangs dang mtshan nyid dang / spyod yul dang 'bras bu'i yul lo //
translated: the enumeration of right knowledge, its characteristics, its domain, and its result.

original: de la re zhig grangs la log bar rtogs pa bsal ba ni /
analyzed: de la re zhig grangs la log bar rtogs pa bsal ba ni /
translated: Among them, the refutation of the wrong understanding of the enumeration is

original: de ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that is twofold.

original: gang zhig thob pa dang spangs pa'i rgyu mtshan rnam par dpyad pa'i skabs kyi /
analyzed: gang zhig thob pa dang spangs pa'i rgyu mtshan rnam par dpyad pa'i skabs kyi /
translated: This is the context of the analysis of the characteristics of attainment and abandonment.

original: 'jug par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa de rnam pa gnyis yin gyi /
analyzed: 'jug par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa de rnam pa gnyis yin gyi /
translated: The correct cognition that engages is twofold.

original: don byed par snang ba ni @7b ma yin te /
analyzed: don byed par snang ba ni @7b ma yin te /
translated: The appearance of the object's function is not that,🔽because it is merely a perception.

original: de ni mngon sum tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don du de zhes smos so //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i don du de zhes smos so //
translated: The word “that” is stated in order to teach this.

original: rnam pa gnyis ni 'di'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ni 'di'i dbye ba'o //
translated: The two types are its division.

original: gal te mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / ces brjod pas rnam pa gnyis 'thob pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag / ces brjod pas rnam pa gnyis 'thob pa de ltar na yang /
translated: Although the two types are obtained by stating “perception and inference,”

original: 'jig rten na don rtogs pa la yang grangs kyi tshig sbyor te /
analyzed: 'jig rten na don rtogs pa la yang grangs kyi tshig sbyor te /
translated: in the world, the word “two” is used for the realization of an object.

original: dper na snam khur dag ni gnyis so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na snam khur dag ni gnyis so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying “two loads.”

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'i sgra yang grangs kyi don du yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba'i sgra yang grangs kyi don du yin no //
translated: The word “two types” also has the meaning of number.

original: yang na ni nges par bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yang na ni nges par bya ba'i don te /
translated: Alternatively, it has the meaning of certainty.

original: rnam pa 'di gnyis kho na yang dag pa'i shes pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di gnyis kho na yang dag pa'i shes pa yin te /
translated: Only these two types are correct cognition.

original: 'dir ni re zhig 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi /
analyzed: 'dir ni re zhig 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi /
translated: Here, only this much is stated for the time being,

original: gzhan yang yod pa nyid do zhes dogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang yod pa nyid do zhes dogs par mi bya'o //
translated: but one should not suspect that there is nothing else.

original: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid kho na bye brag tu bstan par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid kho na bye brag tu bstan par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the characteristic of right knowledge alone should be taught?

original: de'i grangs kyis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de'i grangs kyis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the use of enumerating it?

original: bden te mtshan nyid de nyid ni gsal ba tha dad pa'i mthar thug pas /
analyzed: bden te mtshan nyid de nyid ni gsal ba tha dad pa'i mthar thug pas /
translated: It is true, but that very characteristic is not ultimately distinguished by the different manifestations.

original: gsal ba'i dbye bas ma bstan na mtshan nyid khyad par du bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dbye bas ma bstan na mtshan nyid khyad par du bstan par mi nus te /
translated: If it is not taught by the division of manifestations, the characteristic cannot be taught distinctively.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid bstan pa'i yan lag yin pas grangs kyi sgo nas rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid bstan pa'i yan lag yin pas grangs kyi sgo nas rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba brjod do //
translated: Therefore, since it is a part of the teaching of the characteristic, the division of aspects is stated by way of enumeration.

original: mtshan nyid kyi yan lag yin pa nyid kyis grangs dang por bstan to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi yan lag yin pa nyid kyis grangs dang por bstan to //
translated: Since it is a part of the characteristic, the enumeration is taught first.

original: mi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du mngon par 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis ston te /🔽dbang po la brten pa'i don ni mngon sum mo //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa bzlog pa'i don du mngon par 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis ston te / dbang po la brten pa'i don ni mngon sum mo //
translated: For the sake of countering what is not accepted, two kinds of what is accepted are taught.🔽The meaning of “based on the sense faculties” is direct perception.

original: dbang po la brten pa nyid ni sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: dbang po la brten pa nyid ni sgra bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: Being based on the sense faculties is the reason for the etymological explanation.

original: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni don gyi rang bzhin mngon sum du byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni don gyi rang bzhin mngon sum du byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: The reason for the use of the term is that it is the direct perception of the nature of the object.

original: don mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa nyid ni mngon sum du grags pa yin no //
analyzed: don mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa nyid ni mngon sum du grags pa yin no //
translated: The consciousness that is the direct perception of the object is known as direct perception.

original: de ni shes pa'i gsal ba gcig la 'du ba'i phyir dbang po la brten pa nyid des mtshon nas 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du shes par byed de /
analyzed: de ni shes pa'i gsal ba gcig la 'du ba'i phyir dbang po la brten pa nyid des mtshon nas 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du shes par byed de /
translated: Since it is included in a single instance of the clarity of consciousness, it is known to be the reason for the engagement of the sense faculty.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum bzhi ka la yang mngon sum gyi tha snyad du grub bo ;
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum bzhi ka la yang mngon sum gyi tha snyad du grub bo ;
translated: Therefore, all four types of direct perception are established as direct perception.

original: / dper na 'gro ba'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / dper na 'gro ba'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: For example, in the expression “cow because of going,”

original: don gcig la 'du ba'i 'gro ba'i bya bas ba lang nyid mtshon pas 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du shes par byed de /
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba'i 'gro ba'i bya bas ba lang nyid mtshon pas 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan du shes par byed de /
translated: the action of going, which is included in a single object, is known to be the reason for the engagement of the word cow.

original: des na 'gro bas stong ba'i gong bu la yang de'i rgyu mtshan gyis ba lang gi sgrar grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: des na 'gro bas stong ba'i gong bu la yang de'i rgyu mtshan gyis ba lang gi sgrar grub pa bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, even a lump that is empty of going is established as the word cow by that reason.

original: gang @8a * //
analyzed: gang @8a * //
translated: What is the reason for the use of the term inference?

original: gis rtags gzung zhing 'brel ba dran pa'i rjes la dpog pa de ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
