analyzed: sngar ni de ltar sgra rnams bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa khas blangs nas phyogs kyi chos nyid med pas tshad ma yin pa spangs pa yin la /
translated: Previously, having accepted the connection of words with the probandum, the validity was rejected because of the absence of the property of the subject.

original: da lta ni med na mi 'byung ba de nyid rtsa ba dang bcas te sun phyung ba yin no /
analyzed: da lta ni med na mi 'byung ba de nyid rtsa ba dang bcas te sun phyung ba yin no /
translated: Now, the very non-occurrence without it is refuted along with its root.

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa'i nang du ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur zhing gang zhig la 'di dag tshad ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa'i nang du ji ltar 'du bar 'gyur zhing gang zhig la 'di dag tshad ma yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “How are they included within inference and in what are they valid?,”

original: smra ba po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: smra ba po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The statement “the object of the desire of the speaker” and so on.

original: smra ba bo'i 'dod pa'i don ni 'dod pas yul du byas pa yin la /🔽de yang snang ba dang brtags pa @20a * //
analyzed: smra ba bo'i 'dod pa'i don ni 'dod pas yul du byas pa yin la / de yang snang ba dang brtags pa @20a * //
translated: The object of the desire of the speaker is the object that is taken as the object of desire.🔽Moreover, since appearance and conception are taken as one, it is indeed the intrinsic identity.

original: gcig tu byas pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyang yin mod kyi de la ni tshad ma yin pa sngar bdag pas lhag par gyur pa'i phyi rol du zhen par byas pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba nyid la mngon par 'dod pa'i don du brjod pa yin
analyzed: gcig tu byas pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyang yin mod kyi de la ni tshad ma yin pa sngar bdag pas lhag par gyur pa'i phyi rol du zhen par byas pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba nyid la mngon par 'dod pa'i don du brjod pa yin
translated: However, in that case, it is said that the object of desire is the appearance of the conceptual consciousness that is conceived to be external, which is superior to the internal.

original: no // snang ba de yang shes pa las tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: no // snang ba de yang shes pa las tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: That appearance is not different from consciousness.

original: des na bstan par bya ba'i don du snang ba /
analyzed: des na bstan par bya ba'i don du snang ba /
translated: Therefore, the appearance that is the object to be indicated🔽is the conceptual consciousness that is the motivating factor of the desire to speak.

original: brjod par 'dod pa kun nas slong bar byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid la de skad du brjod pa yin no /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa kun nas slong bar byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par shes pa nyid la de skad du brjod pa yin no /
translated: That is what is referred to.

original: bstan par bya ba'i don du snang ba de nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi brjod par 'dod pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du 'dod pa'i don zhes brjod do //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i don du snang ba de nyid rjes su dpag par bya ba yin gyi brjod par 'dod pa tsam ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du 'dod pa'i don zhes brjod do //
translated: The meaning that is to be expressed is the object that appears to the mind, and it is inferred, not merely desired to be expressed.

original: gzhan du brjod par 'dod pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du brjod par 'dod pa zhes smra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be said that the meaning is desired to be expressed.

original: go bar rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: go bar rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni srid pa'i tshig ste /
translated: The phrase “because it is possible to understand” is a hypothetical statement.

original: sgra rnams kyis ni don ston pa'i bsam pa rjes su dpag par nus srid kyi phyi rol ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni don ston pa'i bsam pa rjes su dpag par nus srid kyi phyi rol ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that it is possible to infer the intention to express a meaning by means of words, but not the external object.

original: / yang na nus pa'i don te /
analyzed: / yang na nus pa'i don te /
translated: Or, the meaning is possible.

original: 'dod pa'i don go bar nus zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don go bar nus zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning is that it is possible to understand the desired meaning.

original: de dag las she na /
analyzed: de dag las she na /
translated: From what?

original: smras pa bum pa khyer shog ces bya ba'i ngag gi don snang ba'i sems pa las ni brjod par 'dod pa 'byung la /
analyzed: smras pa bum pa khyer shog ces bya ba'i ngag gi don snang ba'i sems pa las ni brjod par 'dod pa 'byung la /
translated: The meaning of the statement “Bring the pot” arises from the volition that appears to the mind.

original: de las gnas dang byed pa phrad cing de las sgra skye ba yin no //
analyzed: de las gnas dang byed pa phrad cing de las sgra skye ba yin no //
translated: From that, the place and the action come together, and from that, sound arises.

original: de las sgra brjod par 'dod pa de srid du gnas dang byed pa phrad pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu 'khrul pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de las sgra brjod par 'dod pa de srid du gnas dang byed pa phrad pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu 'khrul pa med pa yin no //
translated: As long as there is a desire to express, there is an infallible cause for the production of the sound, namely, the conjunction of the place and the organ.

original: ngag brjod par 'dod pa med par ngag so so dang / tshig dang yi ge so so'i gnas dang / byed pa phrad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag brjod par 'dod pa med par ngag so so dang / tshig dang yi ge so so'i gnas dang / byed pa phrad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But when there is no desire to express, there is no conjunction of the place and the organ of each of the words and syllables of the speech.

original: 'on kyang ngag brjod par 'dod pa goms pa'i rjes su mthun pa las 'ga' zhig la gnas dang byed pa tshogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis shes pa'i rgyun 'phen par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang ngag brjod par 'dod pa goms pa'i rjes su mthun pa las 'ga' zhig la gnas dang byed pa tshogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis shes pa'i rgyun 'phen par byed pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: However, from the conformity with the desire to express, which is the habit, the stream of consciousness is projected by the mere sign of the conjunction of the place and the organ in some cases.

original: gang gi phyir gzhung goms pa 'don par rtsom pa na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhung goms pa 'don par rtsom pa na /
translated: Because when one begins to recite the text that one has learned,

original: gnyid kyi rtsom pas yid non kyang bsgrim pa med par yongs su ma rdzogs pa 'don pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyid kyi rtsom pas yid non kyang bsgrim pa med par yongs su ma rdzogs pa 'don pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: the recitation is not complete without effort, even though the mind is oppressed by the onset of sleep.

original: 'khrul pa med pa'i brjod par 'dod pa de rjes su dpag pa'i 'bras bu ni srog chags tsam du rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'khrul pa med pa'i brjod par 'dod pa de rjes su dpag pa'i 'bras bu ni srog chags tsam du rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The result of the inference of the infallible desire to express is the understanding of mere sound.

original: de yang 'dir slob dpon gyi bzhed pa ma yin gyi de'i sgrub par byed pa don du snang ba'i bsam pa de ni 'dir rjes su dpag par bya bar bzhed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'dir slob dpon gyi bzhed pa ma yin gyi de'i sgrub par byed pa don du snang ba'i bsam pa de ni 'dir rjes su dpag par bya bar bzhed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, this is not the assertion of the master Dignāga, but it is asserted that the thought that appears to be the proof is what is to be inferred here.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i bsam pa de @20b yang spyos pa dang / goms pa dang lung 'don par 'dod pa las kyang 'jug la /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i bsam pa de @20b yang spyos pa dang / goms pa dang lung 'don par 'dod pa las kyang 'jug la /
translated: That thought that wishes to express also engages from the desire to recite, to be familiar with, and to recite the scriptures.

original: don gzhan bstan par 'dod pas kyang 'jug pas de la sgrub par byed pa mkhas pas /🔽'di ni myos pa dang goms par 'dod pas 'don med par smra ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: don gzhan bstan par 'dod pas kyang 'jug pas de la sgrub par byed pa mkhas pas / 'di ni myos pa dang goms par 'dod pas 'don med par smra ba yang ma yin la /
translated: Since it also engages from the desire to teach a different meaning, the proof of that is🔽as follows. The learned one should ascertain from another source of valid knowledge that this is not a statement without a desire to recite or to be familiar with it.

original: lung 'don par 'dod pas tshig gi dngos po'i ngo bo tsam smra ba yang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lung 'don par 'dod pas tshig gi dngos po'i ngo bo tsam smra ba yang ma yin gyi /
translated: It is also not a statement of the mere nature of the thing, the words, from the desire to recite the scriptures.

original: 'on kyang don ston par 'dod pa kho nas yin no zhes tshad ma gzhan las nges par byas te /
analyzed: 'on kyang don ston par 'dod pa kho nas yin no zhes tshad ma gzhan las nges par byas te /
translated: However, it is definitely from the desire to teach the meaning alone.

original: gzhan du rjes su dpog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du rjes su dpog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no inference otherwise.

original: mkhas pas brda gcig la gnas pa'i smra ba po rnam pa 'ga' zhig las shes par bya zhing don gzhan bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mkhas pas brda gcig la gnas pa'i smra ba po rnam pa 'ga' zhig las shes par bya zhing don gzhan bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: The wise should understand that a speaker who uses a single term may be understood in several ways, and that the sound that arises from the intention to teach a different meaning should be understood.

original: de yang smra ba po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pas mi gsal ba dang / myur ba dang dman par brjod pa las shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang smra ba po'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pas mi gsal ba dang / myur ba dang dman par brjod pa las shes par 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, that is understood from the knowledge of the speaker's nature, from indistinct, fast, or low speech.

original: gzhan bstan par 'dod pa las ni sgra mi gsal ba'am /
analyzed: gzhan bstan par 'dod pa las ni sgra mi gsal ba'am /
translated: From the desire to teach another meaning, there is indistinct sound,

original: dman pa'am myur bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dman pa'am myur bar brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or low or fast speech.

original: smra ba po'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par de tshad ma gzhan las shes shing mngon par 'dod pa dang mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i don bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang shes pa las /
analyzed: smra ba po'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par de tshad ma gzhan las shes shing mngon par 'dod pa dang mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i don bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang shes pa las /
translated: That special state of the speaker is understood from another valid cognition, and the sound that arises from the intention to teach a desired or undesired meaning is understood.

original: bsam pa khyad par can gyi don gyi rnam pa gsal ba kho nar rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa khyad par can gyi don gyi rnam pa gsal ba kho nar rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the special meaning of the intention is inferred only as a clear aspect.

original: gzhan du na rjes su dpag par mi nus te /
analyzed: gzhan du na rjes su dpag par mi nus te /
translated: Otherwise, it cannot be inferred.

original: ji skad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa can gyi 'bras bus ni rgyu 'khrul pa med do zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa can gyi 'bras bus ni rgyu 'khrul pa med do zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is said that the effect that has a very distinct aspect does not deceive its cause.

original: gang yang bsam pa gzhan las skyes pa'i skyes pa'i sgra ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang bsam pa gzhan las skyes pa'i skyes pa'i sgra ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the word “arises” does not occur in any other thought,

original: rgyu las 'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the effect does not deceive its cause.

original: 'on kyang don de nyid bstan par bsam pa kho na las yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang don de nyid bstan par bsam pa kho na las yin la /
translated: However, the very meaning that is to be indicated is thought, and

original: bsam pa de yang yang dag par rig kyang mtshon pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zed pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsam pa de yang yang dag par rig kyang mtshon pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zed pa de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that thought is not indicated because it is not known.

original: 'di ltar bum pa bstan par bsam pa las de'i 'og tu 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las snam bu bstan par 'dod pa byung zhing de las sgra 'byung ba na /
analyzed: 'di ltar bum pa bstan par bsam pa las de'i 'og tu 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las snam bu bstan par 'dod pa byung zhing de las sgra 'byung ba na /
translated: This is not reasonable, because in this way, after the thought to indicate a pot, a desire to indicate a cloth arises from some cause of error, and when a sound arises from that,

original: bar du skyes pa'i bsam pa de ji ltar na nye bar mi mtshon zhes bya /
analyzed: bar du skyes pa'i bsam pa de ji ltar na nye bar mi mtshon zhes bya /
translated: how is it that the thought that arises in the middle is not indicated?

original: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni /
translated: Because these conceptual thoughts

original: yang dag par rig pa ma yin pa ni ma yin te zhes gsungs pa yin no //🔽gal te @21a * //🔽'bras bu gcig nyid du nges pa yin na /
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa ma yin pa ni ma yin te zhes gsungs pa yin no // gal te @21a * // 'bras bu gcig nyid du nges pa yin na /
translated: But it is not that they are not right knowledge.

original: don du ma bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang yod par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: don du ma bstan par bsam pa las skyes pa'i sgra yang yod par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the meaning is not taught, how can a word arise from the intention?

original: gang yang bsam pa gnyis las skyes pa'i bum pa'i sgra ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang yang bsam pa gnyis las skyes pa'i bum pa'i sgra ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
translated: And the word “pot” that arises from two intentions is certainly different,🔽like the plantain tree that arises from seed and stem.

original: dper na sa bon dang sdong bu las skyes pa'i chu shing bzhin no zhes zer ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na sa bon dang sdong bu las skyes pa'i chu shing bzhin no zhes zer ba de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not right,

original: dngos kyi rgyu tha dad na ni 'di dag tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos kyi rgyu tha dad na ni 'di dag tha dad par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: because if the primary causes are different, they are different,

original: dper na chu shing de dag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chu shing de dag nyid bzhin no //
translated: like those plantain trees.

original: sgra'i dngos kyi rgyu ni gnas dang byed pa phrad pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra'i dngos kyi rgyu ni gnas dang byed pa phrad pa yin la /
translated: The primary cause of the word is the contact of the place and the action,

original: de'i rgyu ni brjod par 'dod pa de'i yang rgyu bstan par sems pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni brjod par 'dod pa de'i yang rgyu bstan par sems pa yin no //
translated: and the cause of that is the intention to teach that.

original: don dang ldan pa dag las don dang mi ldan pa'i sgra la yang tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo //🔽de'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa tha dad pa las ni gnas dang byed pa phrad pa tha dad la /
analyzed: don dang ldan pa dag las don dang mi ldan pa'i sgra la yang tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo // de'i phyir brjod par 'dod pa tha dad pa las ni gnas dang byed pa phrad pa tha dad la /
translated: And we do not see the slightest difference between meaningful and meaningless sounds.🔽Therefore, the only reasonable explanation is that the difference in the sounds is due to the difference in the contact of the place and the agent, and that difference is due to the difference in the speaker’s desire to speak.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.

original: de las sgra tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di nyid 'dir rigs pa yin gyi /🔽brjod par 'dod pa ni gang gi tshe bsam pa'i rim pas sbyar ba de'i tshe don yod dam med kyang bla ste /🔽ston par sems pa dag las sgra mtshungs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: de las sgra tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di nyid 'dir rigs pa yin gyi / brjod par 'dod pa ni gang gi tshe bsam pa'i rim pas sbyar ba de'i tshe don yod dam med kyang bla ste / ston par sems pa dag las sgra mtshungs pa yin zhing /
translated: When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.🔽When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.

original: don gzhan bstan pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa na yang 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las go rims btang nas 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa yang brjod par 'dod pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: don gzhan bstan pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa na yang 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig las go rims btang nas 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa yang brjod par 'dod pa 'byung ngo //
translated: When the speaker’s desire to speak is different, the order of the speaker’s thoughts is different, and the order of the sounds is different.

original: des na sgra tha dad pa ni gnas dang byed pa'i tshogs pa tha dad pas yin pa'i phyir bshad pa snga ma nyid legs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na sgra tha dad pa ni gnas dang byed pa'i tshogs pa tha dad pas yin pa'i phyir bshad pa snga ma nyid legs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the difference in words is due to the difference in the collection of place and agent, the former explanation is better.

original: gan yang byed pa'i yon tan dang brjod par 'dod pa nyid dag rjes su dpog par byed do zhes bshad pa de ni 'dod chags ni rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang brjod par 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gyi /
analyzed: gan yang byed pa'i yon tan dang brjod par 'dod pa nyid dag rjes su dpog par byed do zhes bshad pa de ni 'dod chags ni rgyu ma yin gyi 'on kyang brjod par 'dod pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir gyi /
translated: Moreover, it is said that the quality of the agent and the desire to express are inferred. That is taught in order to show that desire is not the cause, but rather the desire to express.

original: don rtogs pa'i bsam pa 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don rtogs pa'i bsam pa 'gog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not to refute the intention to understand the meaning.

original: des na bar ti ka las 'di skad ces /🔽don gang blo la rab gsal ba //
analyzed: des na bar ti ka las 'di skad ces / don gang blo la rab gsal ba //
translated: Therefore, the Vartika says this:🔽The word is valid cognition

original: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
analyzed: de la sgra ni tshad ma nyid //
translated: with regard to that meaning which is clear to the mind.

original: ces gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is what is explained.

original: sgra bsam pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyis rjes su dpogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra bsam pa'i 'bras bu yin pa nyid kyis rjes su dpogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Since the word is the result of thought, it is inferred.

original: rjod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not because it is the expresser.

original: sgra las shes pa brjod par bya ba'i tshul nyid kyis rtogs pa'am /
analyzed: sgra las shes pa brjod par bya ba'i tshul nyid kyis rtogs pa'am /
translated: Knowledge from the word is understood by the method of expression.

original: de la brdar byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brdar byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not created by convention.

original: 'o na rjod par byed pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rjod par byed pa nyid du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If that is so, how can it be the expresser?

original: 'di la ji ltar med pa dang du ba med na @21b mi 'byung ba nyid du dngos po la gnas pa bzhin du de lta bu'i dngos po med kyang brda'i dus na de dag gis sgra don med mi 'byung bar rang gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bzung🔽ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ji ltar med pa dang du ba med na @21b mi 'byung ba nyid du dngos po la gnas pa bzhin du de lta bu'i dngos po med kyang brda'i dus na de dag gis sgra don med mi 'byung bar rang gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis bzung ba yin no //
translated: Just as the absence of smoke is present in the absence of fire, in the same way, even though such an entity does not exist, at the time of convention, they apprehend the non-occurrence of the meaning of the word without the word through their own conceit.

original: de la sgra rang gi mtshan nyid thos pa las sgro btags pa yin yang /
analyzed: de la sgra rang gi mtshan nyid thos pa las sgro btags pa yin yang /
translated: Although the sound is imputed from hearing the sound's intrinsic identity,

original: sgra rnams don dam par med na mi 'byung ba nyid du rtogs la de dag kyang mthong ba dang brtags pa'i don dag gcig tu byas nas phyi rol gyi don la med na mi 'byung ba nyid du sgro btags na brjod par bya ba nyid du rlom par
analyzed: sgra rnams don dam par med na mi 'byung ba nyid du rtogs la de dag kyang mthong ba dang brtags pa'i don dag gcig tu byas nas phyi rol gyi don la med na mi 'byung ba nyid du sgro btags na brjod par bya ba nyid du rlom par
translated: they realize that the sound does not occur without the ultimate existence of the object. Also, having made the seen and the imagined objects one, if they superimpose the non-occurrence of the external object, they assume

original: byed do // des na sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi rjod par byed pa las /
analyzed: byed do // des na sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi rjod par byed pa las /
translated: it to be the object of expression. Therefore, from the expresser that is the nature of superimposition,

original: sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi brjod par bya ba rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: The object is understood as having a nature that is superimposed.

original: don dam par rang gi mtshan nyid dag brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par rang gi mtshan nyid dag brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: But in reality, the object and the expression do not have the nature of entities.

original: des na brda dang lhan cig pa'i sgra las sgro btags pa'i rjod par byed pa rtogs la /
analyzed: des na brda dang lhan cig pa'i sgra las sgro btags pa'i rjod par byed pa rtogs la /
translated: Thus, from the sound that is accompanied by the convention, the expression that is superimposed is understood.

original: de las kyang sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi brjod par bya ba rtogs te /
analyzed: de las kyang sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi brjod par bya ba rtogs te /
translated: And from that, the object that is superimposed is understood.

original: de rtogs pas kyang sgra'i rjod par byed pa'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de rtogs pas kyang sgra'i rjod par byed pa'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
translated: And by understanding that, the function of the expression of the sound is completed.

original: bshad pa'i don gyi sgra'i rnam pa smra ba po'i bsam pas bsdus pa brda'i dbang gis skyed par byed pa nyid du nges par byas pa ni sgra thos pa las rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bshad pa'i don gyi sgra'i rnam pa smra ba po'i bsam pas bsdus pa brda'i dbang gis skyed par byed pa nyid du nges par byas pa ni sgra thos pa las rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The form of the sound of the object that is explained, which is produced by the power of the convention that is included in the thought of the speaker, is ascertained as the cause of understanding from hearing the sound.

original: de'i phyir sngar ni sgro btags pa las brten nas brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar ni sgro btags pa las brten nas brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, previously, the object and the expression are based on the superimposition.

original: phyis ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na las skyed par byed pa'i bsam pa rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyis ni rang gi mtshan nyid kho na las skyed par byed pa'i bsam pa rjes su dpog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Later, the intention to produce only from its own nature is inferred.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba don khyad par cang yi bsam pa dang ldan pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i chos can smra ba po de nyid yin zhing bsam pa'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba don khyad par cang yi bsam pa dang ldan pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i chos can smra ba po de nyid yin zhing bsam pa'i khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Thus, the very speaker who is understood to have the intention of a particular meaning is the subject, and the particular intention is what is to be established.

original: sgra ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bsam pa rjes su su dpag par bya ba la ltos nas rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du ba yin gyi bstan par bya ba ltos na ni sgra rnams tshad ma ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: sgra ni sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir bsam pa rjes su su dpag par bya ba la ltos nas rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du ba yin gyi bstan par bya ba ltos na ni sgra rnams tshad ma ma yin no zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Since the sound is the proof, it is included within inference in dependence on the object to be inferred, but in dependence on the object to be indicated, the sounds are not valid cognitions. This is the point.

original: de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: When that exists, it exists and so on.

original: de yod pa nyid na yod pa zhes nges pa khong nas 'byung ba'i bsdu ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa nyid na yod pa zhes nges pa khong nas 'byung ba'i bsdu ba yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa smos pa yin te /
translated: When that exists, it exists is a summary that definitely arises from within, so it mentions positive and negative concomitance.

original: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa bshad pa yin no //🔽de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa ste /🔽mi dmigs pa ni @22a * //
analyzed: des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa bshad pa yin no // de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa ste / mi dmigs pa ni @22a * //
translated: Therefore, the explanation of the invariable concomitance of the reason with the property to be established is correct.

original: dmigs pa med pa'am gzhan dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'am gzhan dmigs pa'o //
translated: The invariable concomitance is of two kinds: the presence of the reason in the similar instances and the absence of the reason in the dissimilar instances.🔽The absence of the reason in the dissimilar instances is🔽the non-observation of the reason in the dissimilar instances.

original: de yang rjes su dpag pa ma yin te zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: de yang rjes su dpag pa ma yin te zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: This is also not an inference.

original: gang la rjes su dpag pa ma yin zhe na /🔽rab tu skye ba zhes bu la sogs pas yul ston to //
analyzed: gang la rjes su dpag pa ma yin zhe na / rab tu skye ba zhes bu la sogs pas yul ston to //
translated: What is it not an inference of?🔽The author of the commentary explains the object of the inference as “the arising of the effect.”

original: rab tu skye ba ni skye ba ste 'bras bu nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu skye ba ni skye ba ste 'bras bu nyid do //
translated: The arising is the effect.

original: 'di gang gi tshe sgrub par byed ce na /🔽gang gi tshe dngos po de 'bras bu nyid du ni shes la khyad par cang yi 'bras bu nyid du ni nges par ma rtogs pa de'i tshe'o //
analyzed: 'di gang gi tshe sgrub par byed ce na / gang gi tshe dngos po de 'bras bu nyid du ni shes la khyad par cang yi 'bras bu nyid du ni nges par ma rtogs pa de'i tshe'o //
translated: When is this established?🔽When the effect is known to be the effect of that thing, but its specific nature is not ascertained.

original: des na de don khyad par can gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa las de'i 'bras bu nyid du shes par byed de /
analyzed: des na de don khyad par can gyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa las de'i 'bras bu nyid du shes par byed de /
translated: Therefore, the invariable concomitance of the specific object is established by the presence of the reason in the similar instances and the absence of the reason in the dissimilar instances. From this, the effect is known.

original: de'i 'bras bu nyid du bsgrub pa dang dngos po med par bsgrub par bya ba de la rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu nyid du bsgrub pa dang dngos po med par bsgrub par bya ba de la rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not an inference that establishes the nonexistence of a thing as its effect.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: mi dmigs pa las dngos po med pa thengs  pa dang / de yang na yod pa las de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa ni yod pa yin la /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa las dngos po med pa thengs  pa dang / de yang na yod pa las de'i 'bras bu nyid du nges pa ni yod pa yin la /
translated: The nonexistence of a thing is ascertained from nonapprehension, and that is ascertained as the effect of the existence of that thing.

original: nges pa yang tshad ma nyid du 'gyur dgos na /
analyzed: nges pa yang tshad ma nyid du 'gyur dgos na /
translated: And if that ascertainment must be a valid cognition,

original: 'di'i rjes su dpag pa'i nang du yang 'du ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rjes su dpag pa'i nang du yang 'du ba ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: it is not included among the types of inference.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
translated: That is why it says, “because there is no pervasion.”

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means because it is not associated with a pervasion.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'i gtan tshigs la ltos par yin na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'i gtan tshigs la ltos par yin na /
translated: Inference depends on a reason that has a pervasion,

original: de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yod na yod pa dang mi dmigs pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba grub pa ma yin no //
translated: but the existence of that thing and the nonapprehension of it do not have a pervasion.

original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis sgrub pa yin te /🔽dper na khyab par byed pa rim dang cig car mi dmigs pas yod pa nyid la skad cig mas khyab pa bsgrubs la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba ni gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma gzhan gyis sgrub pa yin te / dper na khyab par byed pa rim dang cig car mi dmigs pas yod pa nyid la skad cig mas khyab pa bsgrubs la /
translated: Because the pervasion is established by another authoritative cognition that contradicts it.🔽For example, it is like establishing the pervasion of existence by momentariness through the non-apprehension of the pervader in sequence and simultaneously,

original: khyab pa rab tu grub pa'i yod pa nyid las kyang skad cig ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: khyab pa rab tu grub pa'i yod pa nyid las kyang skad cig ma nyid du sgrub par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: and then establishing momentariness from the established pervasion of existence.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma srid pa'i yul la yang dpe zhes brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma srid pa'i yul la yang dpe zhes brjod pa yin te /
translated: And the example is stated in the context where the authoritative cognition that contradicts it is possible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin te zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin te zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that there is no example for this.

original: gang gi phyir gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma srid na ni de rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma srid na ni de rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because if the authoritative cognition that contradicts it were possible, then the example that demonstrates it would be an example.

original: khyab pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dpe 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dpe 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But since there is no authoritative cognition that establishes the pervasion, there is no example at all.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i don du sgrub par byed pa gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: In order to show just that, it is said because there is no other proof.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs de @22b nyid kyi khyab pa bsgrub pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de nyid kyis ni gtan tshigs de @22b nyid kyi khyab pa bsgrub pa ma yin gyi /
translated: By that very reason, the pervasion of that very reason is not established.

original: 'on kyang tshad ma gzhan gyis yin pas tshad ma gzhan yod na ni de rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe yang yod par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang tshad ma gzhan gyis yin pas tshad ma gzhan yod na ni de rab tu ston pa'i yul dpe yang yod par 'gyur gyi /
translated: However, it is established by another valid cognition. Therefore, if another valid cognition exists, then an example that demonstrates that would also exist.

original: de med na ni de yang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med na ni de yang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if that does not exist, then that would not exist.

original: gal te 'di ltar dpe ni rjes su 'gro ba'i sgrub par byed pa nye bar ston pa tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par bshad pa nyid kyis de med par brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar dpe ni rjes su 'gro ba'i sgrub par byed pa nye bar ston pa tsam la nye bar mkho ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa gzhan med par bshad pa nyid kyis de med par brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: If you say, “In this way, because an example is required merely to demonstrate a reason that is a positive concomitance, if another reason does not exist, then that is stated to not exist.

original: de ji ltar na 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin te zhes zlos su smra zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar na 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin te zhes zlos su smra zhe na /
translated: Why do you repeat, ‘How could it be that this has no example?’”

original: rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa'i tshad ma ni dpe'i chos can kho na la bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa'i tshad ma ni dpe'i chos can kho na la bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows: The valid knowledge that establishes a positive concomitance must be demonstrated only with respect to the property of the example,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i don du ste /
translated: but it is not demonstrated with respect to the property of the subject of the thesis.

original: 'di'i 'bras bu ni mnyan bya dpyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i 'bras bu ni mnyan bya dpyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The result of this is the object of hearing, which will be explained later.

original: gal te snyam du tshad ma 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba sgrub ste /
analyzed: gal te snyam du tshad ma 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba sgrub ste /
translated: If one thinks that this very valid cognition establishes concomitance,

original: 'di ltar 'di myu gu la sogs pa 'ga' zhig bsgrub byar 'dod pa na dpe gzhan grub pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di myu gu la sogs pa 'ga' zhig bsgrub byar 'dod pa na dpe gzhan grub pa yin la /
translated: then when this is asserted to be the probandum of some sprout, etc., it is an established example.

original: de bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyogs 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: Similarly, when some place free from pot, etc. is to be established,

original: gzhan grub pa'i phyir tshad ma 'di nyid la ltos na dpe yod pa yin no zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan grub pa'i phyir tshad ma 'di nyid la ltos na dpe yod pa yin no zhes dogs pa la /
translated: since the other is established, this very valid cognition is the example.

original: de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na yang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na yang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to this doubt, he says, “Even if it is the proof,”🔽and so on.

original: dpe'i'o // gang gis rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tshad ma ston par byed pa de ni dpe ste /
analyzed: dpe'i'o // gang gis rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tshad ma ston par byed pa de ni dpe ste /
translated: The example is that by which the valid cognition that is the reason for ascertaining concomitance is shown.

original: de thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that would lead to an infinite regress.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: gang la gtan tshigs la bsgrub par bya bas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pas rtogs par bya ba'i dpe de la yang ci gtan tshigs 'di rjes su 'gro ba grub nas go bar byed pa yin nam /
analyzed: gang la gtan tshigs la bsgrub par bya bas rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pas rtogs par bya ba'i dpe de la yang ci gtan tshigs 'di rjes su 'gro ba grub nas go bar byed pa yin nam /
translated: If the example is something that is understood through the presence of the pervasion of the logical reason in the predicate, then is the logical reason understood through the establishment of the pervasion?

original: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba ma grub par yin /
analyzed: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba ma grub par yin /
translated: Or is it understood without the establishment of the pervasion?

original: rjes su 'gro ba ma grub par yang go bar byed pa nyid yin na ni tshad ma gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ma grub par yang go bar byed pa nyid yin na ni tshad ma gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is understood without the establishment of the pervasion, then it would follow that there would be another valid cognition.

original: rjes su 'gro ba grub pa nyid yin na yang de la yang rjes su 'gro ba'i yul gyi dpe gzhan btsal dgos te /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba grub pa nyid yin na yang de la yang rjes su 'gro ba'i yul gyi dpe gzhan btsal dgos te /
translated: But if the pervasion is established, then one must seek another example that is an object of the pervasion.

original: des ni ji srid du tshad ma gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa de srid du dpe gzhan tshol bas mtha' thug pa med par 'gyur la /
analyzed: des ni ji srid du tshad ma gzhan gyis rjes su 'gro ba ma grub pa de srid du dpe gzhan tshol bas mtha' thug pa med par 'gyur la /
translated: Since that would seek another example as long as the pervasion is not established by another valid cognition, there would be an infinite regress.

original: de ltar na yang rjes su 'gro ba ma nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na yang rjes su 'gro ba ma nges pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because the pervasion would not be ascertained,

original: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su dpag pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur /
translated: how could it be included in inference?

original: de'i phyir de ltar @23a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar @23a * //
translated: Therefore, in that case,

original: 'brel pa ma nges pas phyogs kyi chos tsam gyis 'khrul pa med par rtogs pa'i tshad ma gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma nges pas phyogs kyi chos tsam gyis 'khrul pa med par rtogs pa'i tshad ma gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the relation is not ascertained, it is another valid cognition that realizes the property of the position without error, merely by the property of the position.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa 'gog par byed pa'o //🔽'di ltar gal te rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dpe med pa de lta na ni rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa 'gog par byed pa'o // 'di ltar gal te rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir dpe med pa de lta na ni rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: It is not so, one says, refuting that it is not an inference.

original: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang yod pas de'i yul gyi dpe yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa'i tshad ma yang yod pas de'i yul gyi dpe yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, if it is not an inference because there is no example due to the absence of a reason that ascertains the forward pervasion, then there is a valid cognition that contradicts that, so there is an example of its object.

original: ji ltar yod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar yod ce na /
translated: How is it?

original: de la yul bstan pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la yul bstan pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “The object is indicated, etc.”

original: yul de yod na yod par 'gyur ba'i myu gu dang / de bzhin du bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba bstan pas te /
analyzed: yul de yod na yod par 'gyur ba'i myu gu dang / de bzhin du bum pas dben pa'i sa phyogs mi dmigs pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba bstan pas te /
translated: The object is the sprout that exists when that exists, and similarly, the place devoid of a pot is the nature of non-observation.

original: bsnyad pas so //
analyzed: bsnyad pas so //
translated: It is indicated, that is, it is explained.

original: 'dir don gyis rgyu mtshan bstan pa yang blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir don gyis rgyu mtshan bstan pa yang blta bar bya ste /
translated: Here, the indication of the reason should also be seen implicitly.

original: 'di ltar med pa'i tha snyad dang / 'bras bu'i tha snyad dag gis rgyu mtshan dang yul bstan par bya ba yin no//
analyzed: 'di ltar med pa'i tha snyad dang / 'bras bu'i tha snyad dag gis rgyu mtshan dang yul bstan par bya ba yin no//
translated: Thus, the reason and the object are indicated by the terms “nonexistence” and “effect.”

original: de la med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ni bum pas dben pa'i phyogs yin la /
analyzed: de la med pa'i tha snyad kyi yul ni bum pas dben pa'i phyogs yin la /
translated: The object of the term “nonexistence” is a place that is devoid of a pot.

original: de'i shes pa ni rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de'i shes pa ni rgyu yin te /
translated: The cognition of that is the reason.

original: gnyi ga yang khyad par med par mi dmigs pa'i tha snyad du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga yang khyad par med par mi dmigs pa'i tha snyad du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Both are taught as the term “non-apprehension,” without distinction.

original: 'bras bu'i tha snyad kyi yul ni de yod pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i tha snyad kyi yul ni de yod pa nyid yin la /
translated: The object of the term “effect” is the existence of that.

original: de 'dzin pa'i mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i mngon sum dang mi dmigs pa ni rgyu yin no //
translated: Direct perception that apprehends that and non-apprehension are the reasons.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang yul gyi sgras rgyu 'phen la rgyu'i sgras kyang yul 'phen pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag tu yang yul gyi sgras rgyu 'phen la rgyu'i sgras kyang yul 'phen pa yin te /
translated: Similarly, in other contexts, the term “object” refers to the reason, and the term “reason” refers to the object.

original: thams cad du slob dpon gyi tha snyad ni 'di lta bu yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du slob dpon gyi tha snyad ni 'di lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the way the master uses terms in all contexts.

original: des na yul dang rgyu 'dis tha snyad 'di la khyod kyis sngon zhugs pa yin no zhes rgyu dang bcas pa'i yul bstan pas pha rol po rmongs pa la rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i med pa'i tha snyad dran par byed do //
analyzed: des na yul dang rgyu 'dis tha snyad 'di la khyod kyis sngon zhugs pa yin no zhes rgyu dang bcas pa'i yul bstan pas pha rol po rmongs pa la rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'i med pa'i tha snyad dran par byed do //
translated: Therefore, the opponent is reminded of the expression of nonexistence together with the reason, by the indication of the cause and the object, “By this object and cause, you previously engaged in this expression.”

original: de lta na yang dran par byas pa'i tshul gyis zhugs pa'i 'brel pa nyid bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang dran par byas pa'i tshul gyis zhugs pa'i 'brel pa nyid bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: Even so, the relation of engagement by the mode of reminding is itself established.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad kyi 'brel pa dran pa la rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa'i dpe yod pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes don gyi mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad kyi 'brel pa dran pa la rjes su 'gro ba nges pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tshad ma'i yul du gyur pa'i dpe yod pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa nyid do zhes don gyi mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: Therefore, because there is an example that is the object of a valid cognition, the reason for ascertaining the relation of engagement with that, the conclusion is drawn that it is an inference.

original: gang gi phyir tha snyad 'di la pha rol po nyid kyis sngar zhugs pa yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha snyad 'di la pha rol po nyid kyis sngar zhugs pa yin la /
translated: Because the opponent himself previously engaged in this expression,

original: rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid yin na ni tha snyad nges pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid yin na ni tha snyad nges pa can nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: if it were without a reason, the expression would be just uncertain.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan mi 'thad pa nyid kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad la ni @23b 'jig rten nyid las 'gyur la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan mi 'thad pa nyid kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad la ni @23b 'jig rten nyid las 'gyur la /
translated: The conventional expressions of cause and effect are due to the world itself.

original: med pa'i tha snyad la ni rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad la ni rtsod pa'i rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: But the conventional expression of nonexistence should follow from the reasoning of debate.

original: de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid du ni lan cig zhugs pa nyid las nges la /
analyzed: de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid du ni lan cig zhugs pa nyid las nges la /
translated: One who has entered the path of seeing is certain to be a person who has that reason.

original: de yod kyang tha snyad 'jug par mi byed na ni rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yod kyang tha snyad 'jug par mi byed na ni rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if, even though he has that reason, he does not engage in the conventional, it follows that there is another reason.

original: de'i phyir de ltar yod kyang tha snyad mi 'jug na ni rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar yod kyang tha snyad mi 'jug na ni rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid yin la /
translated: Therefore, if, even though he has that reason, he does not engage in the conventional, there is another reason.

original: lan cig zhugs pa las tha snyad gang zhig gis rgyu mtshan gang kho na yin par mthong na ni de dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: lan cig zhugs pa las tha snyad gang zhig gis rgyu mtshan gang kho na yin par mthong na ni de dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: But if one sees that he is a person who has that reason, then he is a person who has entered the path of seeing.

original: des na rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pas rjes su 'gro ba grub bo //
analyzed: des na rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pas rjes su 'gro ba grub bo //
translated: Thus, the pervasion is established by the observation of a contradictory reason.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs ni 'di ltar blta ste ;
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs ni 'di ltar blta ste ;
translated: Here is how the argument should be viewed.

original: gang zhig gang kho na'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de ni yod pa na yod pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang kho na'i rgyu mtshan can yin pa de ni yod pa na yod pa nyid yin te /
translated: Whatever is the reason for something, if it exists, then it exists.

original: med pa la ni rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos pas khyab la /
analyzed: med pa la ni rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos pas khyab la /
translated: But if it does not exist, it is pervaded by depending on another reason.

original: de dang 'gal ba yang de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'gal ba yang de tsam gyi rgyu mtshan can yin no //
translated: And the opposite of that is the reason for just that.

original: des na 'dir rgyu mtshan de yod pa tsam gyis tha snyad 'jug par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir rgyu mtshan de yod pa tsam gyis tha snyad 'jug par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, here, the mere existence of the reason is what causes the convention to be engaged.

original: mi dmigs pa tsam rgyu mtshan yin zhing rgyu mtshan gzhan yod par mi 'thad pa yang lan cig tha snyad du zhugs pa las shes pa yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa tsam rgyu mtshan yin zhing rgyu mtshan gzhan yod par mi 'thad pa yang lan cig tha snyad du zhugs pa las shes pa yin no //
translated: The mere non-observation is the reason, and it is understood from the mere engagement in the convention that it is not tenable for another reason to exist.

original: mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs thams cad kyi khyab pa 'grub pa'i tshul ni 'di lta bu kho nar blta'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs thams cad kyi khyab pa 'grub pa'i tshul ni 'di lta bu kho nar blta'o //
translated: This is the only way to see how the pervasion of all reasons of definition is established.

original: gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: There are two types of reasons:

original: tha snyad kyi yul can mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs de ni lan cig tha snyad zhugs pa nyid las tha snyad dang 'brel par shes par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi yul can mtshan nyid kyi gtan tshigs de ni lan cig tha snyad zhugs pa nyid las tha snyad dang 'brel par shes par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The reason of definition, which has a conventional object, is related to the convention from the mere engagement in the convention.

original: dper na ba lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la lan cig tha snyad zhugs pa las kyang 'brel bas shes par 'gyur ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yul la lan cig tha snyad zhugs pa las kyang 'brel bas shes par 'gyur ba lta bu ste /
translated: For example, the reason for the convention “ox” is the object characterized as possessing the characteristics of a dewlap, etc.

original: 'di ni mtshan nyid pa'i gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: 'di ni mtshan nyid pa'i gtan tshigs so //
translated: This is a logical reason of the logicians.

original: gzhan ni dngos po'i ste /
analyzed: gzhan ni dngos po'i ste /
translated: The other is of a thing.

original: gang zhig dngos po'i chos sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po'i chos sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: That which establishes the quality of a thing.

original: tha snyad du rung ba nyid kyang brtags pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad du rung ba nyid kyang brtags pa yin gyi dngos po ni ma yin no //
translated: Even the suitability of a convention is imagined, not a thing.

original: gal te 'di snyam du ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid dam dngos po med pa nyid sgrub par mi byed kyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du ji ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid dam dngos po med pa nyid sgrub par mi byed kyi /
translated: If you think, “In what way does it not establish the nature or thing of cause and effect?

original: 'on kyang tha snyad yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang tha snyad yin zhe na /
translated: But they are conventions,”

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi de'i ngo bo ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi de'i ngo bo ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: we say that the nature of cause and effect is not other than their presence and absence.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las te /🔽dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag @24a * //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag gi rgyu 'bras kyi ngo bo nyid ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las te / dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag @24a * //
translated: The essence of cause and effect is due to the presence or absence of the effect in relation to the cause.

original: las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: It is not other than the presence or absence of the effect.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid du gyur pa de yod na yod pa nyid grub pa kho na'i phyir ci zhig bsgrub tu yod /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid du gyur pa de yod na yod pa nyid grub pa kho na'i phyir ci zhig bsgrub tu yod /
translated: Therefore, if the characteristic exists, then the existence of the effect is established. What else is there to prove?

original: tha snyad kyi rmongs pa la sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no //🔽de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de yod na yod pa nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi rmongs pa la sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no // de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de yod na yod pa nyid rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: The proof is for the sake of those who are confused about the conventional.🔽Just as, when that exists, the existence of the effect is due to the essence of cause and effect,

original: dmigs par rigs pa mi dmigs pa nyid don gyi dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs par rigs pa mi dmigs pa nyid don gyi dngos po med pa ste /
translated: in the same way, the non-apprehension of the object is the non-existence of the object.

original: med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa yin no //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyad du bya ba bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir dngos po med pa yin no //
translated: It is the non-existence of the object because it is the limb that proves the conventional expression of non-existence.

original: 'di ltar dngos po med pa zhes bya ba mngon sum gyis shes par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dngos po med pa zhes bya ba mngon sum gyis shes par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the so-called non-existence is not something to be known by direct perception,

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has no essence.

original: 'on kyang tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang tha snyad du bya ba yin no //
translated: However, it is conventionally.

original: bum pas dben pa'i phyogs su snang ba rang gi don nges pa dang ldan pa'i mngon sum skyes pa nyid kyis snang ba'i dngos po med par nges pa nang du 'du bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bum pas dben pa'i phyogs su snang ba rang gi don nges pa dang ldan pa'i mngon sum skyes pa nyid kyis snang ba'i dngos po med par nges pa nang du 'du bar 'gyur te /
translated: In a place that is devoid of a pot, the arising of a direct perception that possesses the ascertainment of its object will itself ascertain the nonexistence of the appearing thing.

original: snang ba'i dngos po gzhan yod par dogs na /
analyzed: snang ba'i dngos po gzhan yod par dogs na /
translated: If one doubts that another appearing thing exists,

original: des dben pa'i phyogs bdag gis mthong ngo zhes nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: des dben pa'i phyogs bdag gis mthong ngo zhes nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro /
translated: then one will be unable to ascertain that one sees a place devoid of that.

original: de'i phyir de ltar nges par byas pas yul de'i don gyi snang ba'i dngos po gzhan med par nges par byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar nges par byas pas yul de'i don gyi snang ba'i dngos po gzhan med par nges par byas pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, by ascertaining in that way, one ascertains that there is no other appearing thing that is the object of that place.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi don dang de'i shes pa la dngos po med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mngon sum gyi don dang de'i shes pa la dngos po med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the object of direct perception and its cognition are said to be nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi bdag nyid du gyur ba'i mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa grub pas de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni dmigs par rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyi bdag nyid du gyur ba'i mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa grub pas de'i rgyu mtshan can gyi med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni dmigs par rigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad do //
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension which is of the nature of direct perception establishes the non-existence of an entity, and the expression of non-existence which is based on that is established. This is what is explained by the words: “the possibility of apprehension, etc.”

original: dmigs par rigs pa gang la yod pa de ni dmigs par rigs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs par rigs pa gang la yod pa de ni dmigs par rigs pa'o //
translated: That which has the possibility of apprehension is the possible of apprehension.

original: mi dmigs pa na ste /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa na ste /
translated: When there is non-apprehension,

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa las de ma dmigs pa'i phyir med do zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa las de ma dmigs pa'i phyir med do zhes brjod do //
translated: because of the non-apprehension of that which has the nature of the characteristic of apprehension, it is said that it does not exist.

original: nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi tha snyad 'dogs so //🔽'dis ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni mi dmigs pa nyid yin par ston to //
analyzed: nges pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi tha snyad 'dogs so // 'dis ni med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni mi dmigs pa nyid yin par ston to //
translated: The expression is preceded by ascertainment.🔽This shows that the reason for the expression of non-existence is non-apprehension itself.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mi dmigs pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de med pa'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mi dmigs pa yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: “Therefore” means: because non-apprehension is the reason for the expression of non-existence.

original: rgyu mtshan nye bar bstan pas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa 'di la ltos pa 'di'i rgyu mtshan gyis med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan bstan pas bsgrub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nye bar bstan pas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa 'di la ltos pa 'di'i rgyu mtshan gyis med do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan bstan pas bsgrub bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “By teaching the reason” means that the expression “it does not exist” in this non-apprehension is established by teaching the reason.

original: 'di snyam du tha snyad gang zhig gang gi rgyu mtshan can yin @24b pa de ni rgyu mtshan de mthong bas na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la shing nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhin du rang nyid 'jug pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'di snyam du tha snyad gang zhig gang gi rgyu mtshan can yin @24b pa de ni rgyu mtshan de mthong bas na lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la shing nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhin du rang nyid 'jug pa ma yin nam /
translated: In this regard, one might argue as follows: Is not a convention that is based on a reason engaged by itself when that reason is seen, as in the case of the convention “tree” that is based on leaves, etc.?

original: de ji ltar rgyu mtshan tha snyad kyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar rgyu mtshan tha snyad kyi sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How then could the reason be the proof of the convention?

original: rmongs pa la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rmongs pa la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To this he says, “In the case of the confused,”

original: rgyu mtshan mthong du zin kyang rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad 'jug par mi nus pa'i rmongs pa gang yin pa de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du mi dmigs par sbyar ba yin la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan mthong du zin kyang rgyu mtshan can gyi tha snyad 'jug par mi nus pa'i rmongs pa gang yin pa de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don du mi dmigs par sbyar ba yin la /
translated: even though the reason is seen, the convention that is based on the reason is not engaged. The confusion that is incapable of engaging it is the very thing that is to be understood by the application of non-apprehension.

original: de yod na yod pa nyid kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi tha snyad du mi byed pa la sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: de yod na yod pa nyid kyang de'i 'bras bu nyid kyi tha snyad du mi byed pa la sbyor ba yin no //
translated: If it does exist, then the existence of the effect is not made on the basis of that.

original: gang yang lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la shing gi tha snyad du zhugs pa las blun pas phyis brjod pa de la ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir shing ngo zhes sbyor ba kho na ste /
analyzed: gang yang lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa la shing gi tha snyad du zhugs pa las blun pas phyis brjod pa de la ni lo ma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir shing ngo zhes sbyor ba kho na ste /
translated: And in the case of the expression of the tree in relation to the possessor of leaves, etc., the fool later on makes the expression of the tree on the basis of the possessor of leaves, etc.

original: dper na 'di ni ba lang ste lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'di ni ba lang ste lkog shal la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “This is a cow because of possessing a dewlap, etc.”

original: skyed par byed par brjod pa la pha nyid bzhin no zhes bya bas ni /
analyzed: skyed par byed par brjod pa la pha nyid bzhin no zhes bya bas ni /
translated: The expression of the producer is like the father.

original: mi dmigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi dper tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su dpag par ston par byed do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi dper tha snyad sgrub par byed pa'i rjes su dpag par ston par byed do //
translated: This shows that the example is a proof of the expression of the inference that is in accordance with the non-apprehension.

original: skyed par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi pa'i tha snyad la zhugs su zin kyang 'ga' zhig tu brjod pa na pha'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni 'di tsam yin no zhes rab tu grub pa'i yul dran nas de bdag nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can gyi pa'i tha snyad la zhugs su zin kyang 'ga' zhig tu brjod pa na pha'i tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ni 'di tsam yin no zhes rab tu grub pa'i yul dran nas de bdag nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Even though one has engaged in the convention of the cause of production, when one says something, one remembers the object that is established as the cause of the convention of father, and one understands that nature.

original: gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis sgrub par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: Or, it is like the proof of another.

original: ci ste gang zhig la rmongs pa med pa de gang las der med pa'i tha dad pa 'gog pa ni snang ba kho na la zhes smra'o //
analyzed: ci ste gang zhig la rmongs pa med pa de gang las der med pa'i tha dad pa 'gog pa ni snang ba kho na la zhes smra'o //
translated: But if one is not confused about something, then one says that the negation of difference, the nonexistence of that, is only in the appearance.

original: snang ba yod pa ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i pa mi dmigs pa las so zhes smra'o //
analyzed: snang ba yod pa ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i pa mi dmigs pa las so zhes smra'o //
translated: The existence of the appearance is from nonapprehension due to the nonerror of consciousness.

original: snang ba yod pa ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i yul gyi ngo bo nyid kyis khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: snang ba yod pa ni shes pa la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir shes pa'i yul gyi ngo bo nyid kyis khyab pa yin la /
translated: The existence of the appearance is pervaded by the nature of the object of consciousness due to the nonerror of consciousness.

original: shes pa med pa ni khyab par byed pa'i shes pa'i yul de nyid mi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa med pa ni khyab par byed pa'i shes pa'i yul de nyid mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The nonexistence of consciousness is the nonapprehension of that very object of the pervader, consciousness.

original: rtsod pa'i rigs pa las de'i ngo bo yod pa la ni de'i tshad mas khyab pa yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i rigs pa las de'i ngo bo yod pa la ni de'i tshad mas khyab pa yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the logic of debate explains that the existence of the nature of something is pervaded by the valid cognition of that.

original: tha snyad 'dogs pa po yang gang gi phyir 'di na snang ba'i dngos po mi dmigs te /
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs pa po yang gang gi phyir 'di na snang ba'i dngos po mi dmigs te /
translated: Moreover, the one who posits conventions does not observe the thing that appears here.

original: de'i phyir med do zhes dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir med do zhes dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis nye bar mtshon nas /
translated: Therefore, he indicates the nonobservation of that and,

original: de'i khyab par byed pa dmigs par bya ba med pa'i rjes su 'brangs te /
analyzed: de'i khyab par byed pa dmigs par bya ba med pa'i rjes su 'brangs te /
translated: following the nonobservation of the pervader of that,

original: don med pa nyid du rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: don med pa nyid du rtogs par byed do //
translated: he realizes that it is nonexistent.

original: des na gtan tshigs thigs pa las /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs thigs pa las /
translated: Thus, the Drop of Reasons says:

original: gang zhig de yongs su gcod pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa @25a * //
analyzed: gang zhig de yongs su gcod pa na zhes bya ba la sogs pa @25a * //
translated: “When that is ascertained . . .” and so on,

original: dang ; gang yang rnam par nges pa las shes pa ni bdag nyid shes pa gzhan las gcod cing don gyis don gcod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan rnam par gcod pa bshad pa de thams cad ni khyab par byed pa med pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin
analyzed: dang ; gang yang rnam par nges pa las shes pa ni bdag nyid shes pa gzhan las gcod cing don gyis don gcod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan rnam par gcod pa bshad pa de thams cad ni khyab par byed pa med pa nyid kyi rgyu mtshan yin
translated: and “Also, the ascertainment is that the cognition is self-cognizing and the object is cognized by another” and so on, all of that is explained as the exclusion of other.

original: no // dper na 'di ni sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu 'ga' zhig snang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog pa na 'dir 'jig rten na ser po zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no zhes ni mi 'dod kyi /
analyzed: no // dper na 'di ni sngon po yin gyi ser po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu 'ga' zhig snang ba'i bdag nyid yin pa 'gog pa na 'dir 'jig rten na ser po zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin no zhes ni mi 'dod kyi /
translated: For example, when one refutes the nature of something that appears, saying, “This is blue, not yellow,” in the world one does not say, “Yellow does not exist.”

original: 'on kyang snang ba 'di'i rang bzhin du med do zhes bya ba min te /
analyzed: 'on kyang snang ba 'di'i rang bzhin du med do zhes bya ba min te /
translated: However, one does say, “It does not exist in the nature of what appears.”

original: des na ser po snang bar khas blangs nas 'gog pa yin no //
analyzed: des na ser po snang bar khas blangs nas 'gog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, one refutes after accepting that yellow appears.

original: gang gi phyir ji srid du gcig snang ba na de'i bdag nyid 'gog pa de thams cad ni snang ba nyid du khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir snang ba ma dmigs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji srid du gcig snang ba na de'i bdag nyid 'gog pa de thams cad ni snang ba nyid du khas blangs pa yin pa'i phyir snang ba ma dmigs pa nyid yin te /
translated: Because as long as one appears, the nature of that is refuted, all of that is accepted as appearance itself. Therefore, it is the nonapprehension of appearance itself.

original: gtan tshigs thigs pa las khyad par yang brjod par mi bya'o zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thigs pa las khyad par yang brjod par mi bya'o zhes bshad do //
translated: In the Tarka-jvālā it is explained that a specific example should not be stated.

original: de'i phyir ji srid du shes pa dang snang ba'i don la de'i bdag nyid 'gog pa de la snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid yod pas khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji srid du shes pa dang snang ba'i don la de'i bdag nyid 'gog pa de la snang ba mi dmigs pa nyid yod pas khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, as long as the identity of the object of cognition and appearance is refuted, there is no pervasion by the non-apprehension of appearance.

original: tha dad pa 'gog pa ni snang ba kho na la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa 'gog pa ni snang ba kho na la khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The refutation of difference is the non-apprehension of the pervader in appearance alone.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes khyad par du byas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa zhes khyad par du byas so //
translated: For that very reason, it is specified as having the character of apprehension.

original: de'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa kho nas 'gog pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa kho nas 'gog pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is only the non-apprehension of the pervader that is the refutation.

original: shes pa dang shes bya dmigs pa med pa ni rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i shes pa yang dag par rig pa nyid kyis nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes pa dang shes bya dmigs pa med pa ni rnam pa gcig tu nges pa'i shes pa yang dag par rig pa nyid kyis nges par 'gyur te /
translated: The non-apprehension of object and cognition is ascertained by the cognition that is ascertained as the correct knowledge of the single aspect.

original: yod pa bzhin du shes pa tsam la ni the tshom yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa bzhin du shes pa tsam la ni the tshom yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no doubt about mere cognition that exists.

original: de'i phyir shes pa gcig myong ba nyid las 'di ni dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa gcig myong ba nyid las 'di ni dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, this is apprehended from the experience of a single cognition.

original: 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes shes pa dang shes bya dag dmigs pa dang ma dmigs par nges par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes shes pa dang shes bya dag dmigs pa dang ma dmigs par nges par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is the ascertainment of the object and the consciousness that knows it, in terms of whether or not they are observed.

original: 'di ni dmigs so 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa can yul dang shes pa 'gog pa dang / bsgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis mngon sum 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni dmigs so 'di ni ma dmigs so zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa can yul dang shes pa 'gog pa dang / bsgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis mngon sum 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin gyi /
translated: Direct perception is accompanied by a result in the sense that it is the refutation and proof of objects and consciousnesses in terms of whether or not they are observed, as in “This is observed” or “This is not observed.”

original: 'di ni yod do 'di ni med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par dngos po yod pa dang med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis kyang 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yod do 'di ni med do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par dngos po yod pa dang med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gis kyang 'bras bu dang bcas pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not accompanied by a result in the sense that it is the refutation and proof of existent and nonexistent things in terms of whether or not they exist, as in “This exists” or “This does not exist.”

original: 'di ni ma yin no zhe'am med @25b do zhes bya ba de lta bu yod pa 'gog pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam par rtog pa ni mi dmigs pas sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni ma yin no zhe'am med @25b do zhes bya ba de lta bu yod pa 'gog pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam par rtog pa ni mi dmigs pas sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The conceptual thought that is the convention of negation, “This is not,” or “This does not exist,” is established by nonobservation.

original: mngon sum gyis ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not established by direct perception.

original: de'i phyir dmigs pa'i shes pa dang shes bya nyid shes bya mi dmigs pa nges pa'i rgyu phyir mi dmigs par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dmigs pa'i shes pa dang shes bya nyid shes bya mi dmigs pa nges pa'i rgyu phyir mi dmigs par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the non-apprehension of the object of knowledge is said to be the cause of the ascertainment of the non-apprehension of the object of knowledge itself by the cognizing consciousness.

original: de la mi snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pas ni mi snang ba dngos po med par nges pa nang du sdud par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la mi snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pas ni mi snang ba dngos po med par nges pa nang du sdud par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: As for the ascertainment of the non-apprehension of the non-appearing, it does not include the ascertainment of the non-existence of the non-appearing.

original: de ni dngos po med pa la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dngos po med pa la 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is mistaken with regard to the non-existent.

original: snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pas ni shugs kyis snang ba dngos po med par 'phangs pa yin te /
analyzed: snang ba dmigs pa med par nges pas ni shugs kyis snang ba dngos po med par 'phangs pa yin te /
translated: As for the ascertainment of the non-apprehension of the appearing, it indirectly implies the non-existence of the appearing.

original: snang ba'i dngos po gzhan yod na de mi dmigs par mi rigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shugs yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i dngos po gzhan yod na de mi dmigs par mi rigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni shugs yin no //
translated: Because it is not logical that the non-apprehension of the appearing is not possible if the entity of the appearing exists elsewhere. This is the indirect implication.

original: de'i phyir gcig tu nges pa'i shes pa nges par byed pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis snang ba'i dngos po med par nges par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig tu nges pa'i shes pa nges par byed pa'i mngon sum nyid kyis snang ba'i dngos po med par nges par byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the ascertainment of the non-existence of the entity of the appearing is made by the direct perception that produces the ascertainment of the consciousness that is ascertained as one.
