original: 'di dag ni gsal bar snang bas rtog pa med pa nyid yin pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba'i phyir mi slu ba nyid med pas tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag ni gsal bar snang bas rtog pa med pa nyid yin pa yang dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba'i phyir mi slu ba nyid med pas tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: and so on, which are the causes of error that exist in the sense faculties, exist in external objects, and exist in the basis, and any other disturbances that are produced by them.

original: rang dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //🔽dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba nyid kyang yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //🔽dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba nyid kyang yul dang dus dang rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and so on, which

original: 'dir zla ba gnyis su snang ba'i shes pa ni re zhig yul la 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir zla ba gnyis su snang ba'i shes pa ni re zhig yul la 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: Here, the cognition of the appearance of two moons is first of all mistaken with respect to the object,

original: zla ba gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zla ba gnyis su mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because two moons do not exist.

original: des na rang bzhin la 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: des na rang bzhin la 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is mistaken with respect to the intrinsic nature,

original: gnyis kyi rang bzhin du snang ba ni gcig gi rang bzhin dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis kyi rang bzhin du snang ba ni gcig gi rang bzhin dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of the intrinsic nature of two is incompatible with the intrinsic nature of one.

original: 'gal ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin pas ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i rang bzhin 'dzin pas ni /
translated: When it apprehends an intrinsic nature that is incompatible,

original: rang bzhin gzhan gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: it does not apprehend another intrinsic nature,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would be absurd.

original: 'khor lor snang ba ni don byed pa'i rang bzhin la 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor lor snang ba ni don byed pa'i rang bzhin la 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: The appearance of a wheel is mistaken with respect to the intrinsic nature that performs a function,

original: bkod pa dang bral ba'i kha dog ni don byed pa dang ldan pa ma yin la /
analyzed: bkod pa dang bral ba'i kha dog ni don byed pa dang ldan pa ma yin la /
translated: because a color that is not arranged does not perform a function,

original: bkod @42a * //
analyzed: bkod @42a * //
translated: and

original: pa yang ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa yang ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the arrangement is not apprehended.

original: bkod pa btang ba'i phyir de dang lhan cig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba yin no //
analyzed: bkod pa btang ba'i phyir de dang lhan cig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba yin no //
translated: Because the arrangement is relinquished, the intrinsic nature that accompanies it is relinquished.

original: yul la 'khrul par ni gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: yul la 'khrul par ni gsal ba yin te /
translated: It is clear that it is mistaken with respect to the object.

original: yul gcig na gnas pa'i mgal me la yul du ma na gnas par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gcig na gnas pa'i mgal me la yul du ma na gnas par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the firebrand is seen in one place, but is apprehended as being in many places.

original: de bzhin du ljon shing 'gro bar snang ba ni yul la 'khrul pa yin la des na rang bzhin la yang 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ljon shing 'gro bar snang ba ni yul la 'khrul pa yin la des na rang bzhin la yang 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: In the same way, the appearance of the tree as moving is a mistake with regard to the object, and thereby is a mistake with regard to the nature of the object.

original: de bzhin du 'ga' zhig tu kha dog la 'khrul ba /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'ga' zhig tu kha dog la 'khrul ba /
translated: In the same way, in some cases there is a mistake with regard to color.

original: dper na dung la ser por snang bar shes pa lta bu ni don byed pa'i rnam pa la 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: dper na dung la ser por snang bar shes pa lta bu ni don byed pa'i rnam pa la 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: For example, the cognition that perceives a conch as yellow is a mistake with regard to the aspect of the object’s causal capacity.

original: kha dog ni rang bzhin nyid do//
analyzed: kha dog ni rang bzhin nyid do//
translated: Color is the nature of the object.

original: thams cad du yang don thob pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi shes pa gzhan la rag las pa yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: thams cad du yang don thob pa ni 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi shes pa gzhan la rag las pa yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: And in all cases, the attainment of the object is dependent on another cognition that is the sign of the engagement.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khrul pa'i shes pa dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba ni ma 'khrul pa smos pas bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i 'khrul pa'i shes pa dngos po'i rang bzhin yongs su btang ba ni ma 'khrul pa smos pas bzlog pa yin no //
translated: The cognition that is mistaken in this way, which is a relinquishment of the nature of the object, is the opposite of non-mistaken, as stated.

original: de'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i 'khrul pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i 'khrul pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid sdud pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a summary of the characteristics of non-error and non-conceptuality, which will be explained.

original: gal te ma 'khrul pa zhes de skad brjod na ni mtshan nyid 'di dag gang yang rung bas mtshon pa mngon sum nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ma 'khrul pa zhes de skad brjod na ni mtshan nyid 'di dag gang yang rung bas mtshon pa mngon sum nyid du dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is said to be non-erroneous, there is the concern that it is directly perceived by any of these characteristics.

original: des na 'khrul pa med cing rtog pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de mngon sum yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa med cing rtog pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de mngon sum yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that that which is non-erroneous and free from conceptuality is direct perception.

original: mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral ba yin la /
analyzed: mngon sum ni rtog pa dang bral ba yin la /
translated: Direct perception is free from conceptuality.

original: de yang ci 'dra ba zhig yin par 'dod pa bstan pa'i don du mngon par brjod pa can zhes smos te /
analyzed: de yang ci 'dra ba zhig yin par 'dod pa bstan pa'i don du mngon par brjod pa can zhes smos te /
translated: In order to show what kind of direct perception is accepted, the term with expression is used.

original: 'di la brjod pa yod pas na brjod pa can no //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa yod pas na brjod pa can no //
translated: It is with expression because it has expression.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa 'dis don brjod pa'i phyir brjod pa ni sgra la bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel par bshad pa 'dis don brjod pa'i phyir brjod pa ni sgra la bya'o //
translated: This is explained in the commentary. Expression is to be understood as sound because it expresses meaning.

original: de dang 'dre ba ni shes pa'i bdag nyid gcig la tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: de dang 'dre ba ni shes pa'i bdag nyid gcig la tshogs pa ste /
translated: Mixing with that is the collection in one consciousness.

original: rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang / brjod par bya ba'i don du snang ba'i shes pa gcig gi gzung ba'i bdag nyid du gnas so //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang / brjod par bya ba'i don du snang ba'i shes pa gcig gi gzung ba'i bdag nyid du gnas so //
translated: The sound that expresses and the cognition that appears as the object to be expressed are present as the nature of the object of apprehension of a single cognition.

original: don gyi rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i rnam pa dang lhan cig tu shes pa gcig la snang bar 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i rnam pa dang lhan cig tu shes pa gcig la snang bar 'gyur na ni /
translated: If the aspect of the object appears in a single cognition together with the aspect of the sound that expresses it,

original: de'i tshe ba brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dag 'dres pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe ba brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa dag 'dres pa yin no //
translated: then at that time the object to be expressed and the expression are mixed.

original: 'dri ba'i phyir rung ba zhes don ston pa yin pa'i phyir drug pa'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'dri ba'i phyir rung ba zhes don ston pa yin pa'i phyir drug pa'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: Because it is suitable for questioning, it is included in the sixth, meaning, because it shows the meaning.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang lhan cig @42b pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa de ni de skad ces brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i don gyi snang ba gzung ba'i rnam pa rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang lhan cig @42b pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa de ni de skad ces brjod pa yin no //
translated: The aspect of the object that has become like that, the aspect of the object of apprehension together with the sound that expresses it, is called that expression.

original: rtog pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin par bstan la /
analyzed: rtog pa ni sbyor bar byed pa yin par bstan la /
translated: Imagination is taught to be the connector.

original: sbyor bar byed pa yang sgra dang don bsdus nas 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor bar byed pa yang sgra dang don bsdus nas 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: And the connector is the apprehension that combines sound and meaning.

original: gal te de ltar na 'dres par snang ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na 'dres par snang ba zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: If that is so, should it not be called a “mixed appearance”?

original: ci'i phyir rung ba zhes smos she na brda la ma byang ba la rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang 'dres pa'i don snang ba'i rtog pa ni cung zad kyang med la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rung ba zhes smos she na brda la ma byang ba la rjod par byed pa'i sgra dang 'dres pa'i don snang ba'i rtog pa ni cung zad kyang med la /
translated: Why is “suitable” mentioned? For one who is not skilled in signs, there is no conception that appears as a meaning mixed with the term that expresses it.

original: de la rtog pa ni yod pa yin pas rung ba smos pa ni de sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rtog pa ni yod pa yin pas rung ba smos pa ni de sdud pa yin no //
translated: But since conception does exist, “suitable” is mentioned to include it.

original: deng skyes pa'i byis pa rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni don nye ba la ltos pa med pa de'i phyir snang ba nges pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: deng skyes pa'i byis pa rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa ni don nye ba la ltos pa med pa de'i phyir snang ba nges pa med pa yin la /
translated: The conception of a newborn infant is not dependent on a nearby object, and therefore its appearance is indefinite.

original: snang ba nges pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rung ba yin no //
analyzed: snang ba nges pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rung ba yin no //
translated: And because its appearance is indefinite, it is suitable.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de ni nu ma la sngon mthong ba'i bkres pa zlog par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa na byis pa 'jug par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa de ni nu ma la sngon mthong ba'i bkres pa zlog par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa na byis pa 'jug par byed pa yin la /
translated: When that conceptual consciousness realizes that the breast is the means of satisfying hunger, it causes the infant to engage it.

original: snga ma dang phyi ma dag tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa ni don nye ba la ltos pa med par grub po //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma dag tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa ni don nye ba la ltos pa med par grub po //
translated: The apprehension of the former and the latter as not different is established without regard to the proximity of the object.

original: sgra'i snang ba yang de la yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra'i snang ba yang de la yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And the appearance of the sound is also present there.

original: de la skye ba gzhan du goms pa las sgra'i rnam pa mi gsal ba yod dam med kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de la skye ba gzhan du goms pa las sgra'i rnam pa mi gsal ba yod dam med kyang rung ste /
translated: In that case, whether or not there is an unclear image of the sound due to habituation in another life,

original: phyis goms pas byas pa'i khyed par can gyi sgra dang 'brel pa'i don snang ba ni thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyis goms pas byas pa'i khyed par can gyi sgra dang 'brel pa'i don snang ba ni thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the appearance of the object connected with the sound that is produced by later habituation is not present in all cases.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pa de ni yul gyi byed pa la ni mi ltos pa nyid kyis snang ba nges pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rtogs pa de ni yul gyi byed pa la ni mi ltos pa nyid kyis snang ba nges pa med pa yin la /
translated: That conceptual cognition does not depend on the activity of the object, and so the appearance is uncertain.

original: de las kyang sgra dang 'drer rung ba snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de las kyang sgra dang 'drer rung ba snang ba bzhin no //
translated: And from that, the appearance is suitable to be mixed with the sound, just as it appears.

original: de zhes bya ba rtog pa 'di dbang po'i shes pa la srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba rtog pa 'di dbang po'i shes pa la srid pa ma yin no //
translated: This conceptual cognition called “that” is not possible in a sense perception.

original: de zhes bya ba ni chos can gyis snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni chos can gyis snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa ste /
translated: “ That” indicates the property possessor, and “appearance” indicates the property.

original: brjod pa dang 'drer rung ba'i snang ba ni dbang po'i shes pa la srid pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: brjod pa dang 'drer rung ba'i snang ba ni dbang po'i shes pa la srid pa ma yin zhing /
translated: The appearance that is suitable to be mixed with the expression does not exist for the sense consciousness.

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la ni de lta bur gyur pa'i snang ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la ni de lta bur gyur pa'i snang ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that such an appearance does not exist for the sense consciousness.

original: gzhan du yang chos can gyis chos bstan pa ni yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du yang chos can gyis chos bstan pa ni yod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is possible to teach a property by means of an example.

original: dper nar can zhog dang ldan pa mtha' na mjug ma yod pa zhes rva la sogs pa dang ldan pa ba lang nyid kyi rtags su gyur pa rva la sogs pa nyid ston par byed pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dper nar can zhog dang ldan pa mtha' na mjug ma yod pa zhes rva la sogs pa dang ldan pa ba lang nyid kyi rtags su gyur pa rva la sogs pa nyid ston par byed pa nyid yin te /
translated: For example, when one says, “Where there is a hump, there are hooves,” the sign of oxhood, which is the possession of horns and so on, is taught.

original: de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin no //
translated: It is the same here.

original: gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan dang bral ba dbang po'i shes par brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan dang bral ba dbang po'i shes par brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the consciousness free from other conceptual consciousnesses would be called a sense consciousness.

original: de lta na yang ma brjod pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur @43a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang ma brjod pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur @43a * //
translated: Even so, it would be as if it were not expressed.

original: ro ; / rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis stong ba yin te /
analyzed: ro ; / rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yang rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyis stong ba yin te /
translated: A conceptual consciousness is also empty of another conceptual consciousness.

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not non-conceptual.

original: de'i phyir des stong ba'i rang gi ngo bo brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir des stong ba'i rang gi ngo bo brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that its own nature is empty of that.

original: yang de dag las zhes dogs pa la gtan tshigs ston te /🔽don de brjod par bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid gzugs la sogs pa'i mthus te /
analyzed: yang de dag las zhes dogs pa la gtan tshigs ston te / don de brjod par bya ba mngon par 'dod pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid gzugs la sogs pa'i mthus te /
translated: Again, in response to the doubt, “How is that so?” the reason is shown.

original: byed pa las yang dag skye ba ste 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa las yang dag skye ba ste 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that it arises, that is, occurs, by the power of the intrinsic identity of the object that is intended to be expressed, such as form, etc.

original: gang gi phyir don gyi stobs kyis skyes pa yin gyi rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i stobs kyis ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir don gyi stobs kyis skyes pa yin gyi rjod par byed pa'i sgra'i stobs kyis ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: It is not that it arises by the power of the expressive sound.

original: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgrar snang ba ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po'i rnam par shes pa sgrar snang ba ma yin no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the sense consciousness does not appear as sound.

original: 'di snyam du gal te don gyi nus pas bskyed pa de lta na yang sgrar snang bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te don gyi nus pas bskyed pa de lta na yang sgrar snang bar ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes dogs pa la /
translated: If one thinks, “Even if it is generated by the power of the object, why does it not appear as sound?”

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The reason is stated:

original: gang gi phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de don gyi nus pa las skye ba'i phyir de'i rang bzhin kho na'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rjes su byed pa srid pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa de don gyi nus pa las skye ba'i phyir de'i rang bzhin kho na'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rjes su byed pa srid pa yin no //
translated: Because the sense consciousness arises from the potentiality of the object, it is only natural that it should conform to the object.

original: de'i phyir sgrar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgrar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not appear as sound.

original: bsam pa 'di yin te rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pas khyad par can gyi don snang ba'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la de'i stobs las skyes pas khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir skyed pa'i don de'i rjes su byed pa
analyzed: bsam pa 'di yin te rgyu ma yin pa yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pas khyad par can gyi don snang ba'i dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la de'i stobs las skyes pas khyab pa yin pa de'i phyir skyed pa'i don de'i rjes su byed pa
translated: The idea is this: By the principle of “non-cause, non-object,” the sense consciousness that appears as a qualified object is necessarily produced by the power of that object. Therefore, it is natural that it should conform to the object.

original: srid pa yin no //
analyzed: srid pa yin no //
translated: It is possible.

original: gal te sgra yang snang bar gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te sgra yang snang bar gyur na ni /
translated: If sound were to appear,

original: khyab bya sgra'i rjes su byed pa grub pas khyab byed de'i stobs las skyes pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab bya sgra'i rjes su byed pa grub pas khyab byed de'i stobs las skyes pa yang ma yin no //
translated: then since it would be established as conforming to the object, it would not be produced by the power of that object.

original: de'i phyir snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not appear.

original: 'di snyam du gal te dbang po'i shes pa don gyi 'bras bu yin na sgra'i 'bras bu yang yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te dbang po'i shes pa don gyi 'bras bu yin na sgra'i 'bras bu yang yin pa kho na'o //
translated: If you think that the sense perception is the effect of the object, then it is also the effect of the sound.

original: 'di ltar sgra thams cad du khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra thams cad du khyab pa yin no //
translated: Because sound pervades everywhere.

original: de bas na don gyi yul na yang de rjod par byed pa'i sgra nye ba kho na'o //
analyzed: de bas na don gyi yul na yang de rjod par byed pa'i sgra nye ba kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, even in the place of the object, only the sound that expresses it is present.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa don bzhin du sgra'i yang yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa don bzhin du sgra'i yang yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, consciousness, like the object, is the effect of the sound, and it is not the case that it is not the effect of the sound.

original: yang na brda sprod pa rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i don ni sgra nyid kyi bdag nyid yin pa'am /
analyzed: yang na brda sprod pa rnams kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i don ni sgra nyid kyi bdag nyid yin pa'am /
translated: Or, the meaning that is transformed by the grammarians is the nature of sound itself.

original: yang grangs can rnams kyi sna tshogs ni sgra la sogs pa lnga'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa des na don sgra'i bdag nyid can yin no //
analyzed: yang grangs can rnams kyi sna tshogs ni sgra la sogs pa lnga'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa des na don sgra'i bdag nyid can yin no //
translated: Or, the variety of the Sāṃkhyas is the transformation of the five, such as sound. Therefore, the object has the nature of sound.

original: de'i phyir don sgra'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don sgra'i rang bzhin nyid yin la /
translated: Therefore, the object is the nature of sound.

original: de las kyang sgra dang don dag gi rjes su 'gro @43b ba'i rjes su byed par mtshungs pa de'i phyir 'di la khyab par byed pa de'i stobs las skyes pa med pa ma yin no zhes dogs na /
analyzed: de las kyang sgra dang don dag gi rjes su 'gro @43b ba'i rjes su byed par mtshungs pa de'i phyir 'di la khyab par byed pa de'i stobs las skyes pa med pa ma yin no zhes dogs na /
translated: Moreover, since the word and the object are similar in that they both have a universal, therefore, it is not the case that the word is not generated by the power of the universal.

original: bshad pa gang gi phyir don la sgra yod ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa gang gi phyir don la sgra yod ma yin no //
translated: If you think this, then Nāgārjuna responds: Because the word does not exist in the object.

original: 'di ltar yod pa nyid ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa nyid ni don byed pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis yin la /
translated: Thus existence is the reason for the performance of an object’s function.

original: don byed pa'i khyad par gyis kyang yod pa'i khyad par yin zhing /
analyzed: don byed pa'i khyad par gyis kyang yod pa'i khyad par yin zhing /
translated: And the distinction of the performance of an object’s function is the distinction of existence.

original: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las khyad par can gyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa na khyad par dang ldan par rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las khyad par can gyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa na khyad par dang ldan par rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, when the distinction is related to the aspect of the universal through the relation of concomitance and reverse entailment, it is understood to possess the distinction.

original: sgra yang don byed pa gang yin pa de las yod par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra yang don byed pa gang yin pa de las yod par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: And the word is asserted to exist in virtue of the performance of an object’s function.

original: don byed par nus pa de ni rang gi rnam pa nyid kyis yin par mngon sum du khong du chud la don kyang yin na /
analyzed: don byed par nus pa de ni rang gi rnam pa nyid kyis yin par mngon sum du khong du chud la don kyang yin na /
translated: If that which is able to perform a function is directly understood to exist by its own aspect and is also an object,

original: don la ni sgra dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don la ni sgra dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But in fact, the sound is not the referent.

original: ji ltar gzhan du dmigs pa la gzhan yod par brjod de /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan du dmigs pa la gzhan yod par brjod de /
translated: How can one say that the referent exists in the perception of something else?

original: ha cang thal ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //🔽de nyid kyis na de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: ha cang thal ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // de nyid kyis na de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: Because that would be absurd.🔽For the same reason, the referent is not of the nature of the sound.

original: de'i bdag nyid dam de nyid gang dag gis bdag nyid yin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dam de nyid gang dag gis bdag nyid yin pa'o //
translated: The referent is not of the nature of the sound, nor is it the sound itself.

original: don bya ba nus pa'i sgra ni don gyi rang bzhin spangs par tshad mas dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: don bya ba nus pa'i sgra ni don gyi rang bzhin spangs par tshad mas dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The sound that is capable of referring to the referent is perceived by valid cognition as being different from the nature of the referent.

original: don kyang sgra'i rang bzhin spang bar dmigs pa yin na de ji ltar tshad mas dmigs bzhin du bdag nyid slu bar byed /
analyzed: don kyang sgra'i rang bzhin spang bar dmigs pa yin na de ji ltar tshad mas dmigs bzhin du bdag nyid slu bar byed /
translated: And the referent is perceived as being different from the nature of the sound. So how can one be deceived about their nature while they are being perceived by valid cognition?

original: de'i phyir sgra rnams de'i yul na gnas pa ma yin la de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rnams de'i yul na gnas pa ma yin la de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, since the sound is neither the referent nor of the nature of the referent,

original: gang gis de'i yul na gnas pa dang de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i sgo nas don bzhin du sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gis de'i yul na gnas pa dang de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i sgo nas don bzhin du sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: how can the referent follow the sound in terms of being present where the sound is present and being absent where the sound is absent, just as the sound does?

original: don de rang gi 'bras bu la snang ba na de dag kyang rgyur gyur bas snang bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: don de rang gi 'bras bu la snang ba na de dag kyang rgyur gyur bas snang bar 'gyur ba /
translated: When the object appears to its own effect, it appears because it has become the cause.

original: de'i bdag nyid dang de'i yul na gnas pa ni med la /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid dang de'i yul na gnas pa ni med la /
translated: It does not exist as the essence of that nor does it exist as the object of that.

original: logs shig rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yang ma yin pa des na de'i stobs kyis skyes pa nyid med pa'i phyir de snang ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: logs shig rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa yang ma yin pa des na de'i stobs kyis skyes pa nyid med pa'i phyir de snang ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist as something separate that conforms with the object, nor does it exist as something separate that conforms with the object’s absence. Therefore, it is not the appearance of that because it is not produced by the power of that.

original: gal te shes pa'i chos 'ga' zhig ni phyi rol la rag las pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i chos 'ga' zhig ni phyi rol la rag las pa yin te /
translated: If you ask, “Are there any phenomena of consciousness that depend on external objects?

original: dper na sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, the appearance of blue and so on?

original: kha cig ni de las bzlog pa yin te /
analyzed: kha cig ni de las bzlog pa yin te /
translated: Are there any that are the opposite of that?

original: dper na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin lta bu ma yin nam /
analyzed: dper na rtogs pa'i rang bzhin lta bu ma yin nam /
translated: For example, the nature of conceptual consciousness?”

original: don gyi snang ba ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir phyi rol dang 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: don gyi snang ba ni res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir phyi rol dang 'brel pa yin la /
translated: The appearance of an object is sometimes related to an external object because it is intermittent.

original: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni phyi rol la ltos pa med pa'i phyir rang gi nye bar len pa dang 'brel @44a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ni phyi rol la ltos pa med pa'i phyir rang gi nye bar len pa dang 'brel @44a * //
translated: The nature of conceptual consciousness is related to its own substantial cause because it is not dependent on an external object.

original: pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: sgra'i snang ba 'di rang gi nye bar len pa tsam la rag las pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i snang ba 'di rang gi nye bar len pa tsam la rag las pa yin no //
translated: The appearance of sound depends only on its appropriation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir shes pa mtha' dag la rjes su 'brang ba des na phyi rol gyi snang ba nyid de med na mi 'byung ba yin gyi gang 'di sgra'i rnam par zhes bya ba shes pa'i chos de ni de'i nye bar sbyor ba med kyang nye bar
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir shes pa mtha' dag la rjes su 'brang ba des na phyi rol gyi snang ba nyid de med na mi 'byung ba yin gyi gang 'di sgra'i rnam par zhes bya ba shes pa'i chos de ni de'i nye bar sbyor ba med kyang nye bar
translated: Therefore, since it is concomitant with all consciousnesses, the external appearance is its non-arising when it is absent. But that phenomenon of consciousness called the aspect of sound arises from its mere appropriation even when its application is absent.

original: len pa tsam las 'byung ba des na khyab pa ma grub pa yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
analyzed: len pa tsam las 'byung ba des na khyab pa ma grub pa yin no snyam du dogs pa la /
translated: Thus, he thinks that the pervasion is not established.

original: rig pa'i chos 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rig pa'i chos 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response to this, the root text states, “This phenomenon of awareness . . . ”

original: rig pa ste shes pa'i chos sgra'i rnam pa zhes bya ba 'di phyi rol gyis ma byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rig pa ste shes pa'i chos sgra'i rnam pa zhes bya ba 'di phyi rol gyis ma byas pa ma yin te /
translated: This phenomenon of awareness, or consciousness, called the aspect of sound is not unproduced by external objects.

original: 'on kyang 'di phyi rol gyis byas pa nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di phyi rol gyis byas pa nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: However, it should be accepted that it is produced by external objects.

original: reg pa ni rgyu'i dngos por 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni rgyu'i dngos por 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Contact is the apprehension of the object as a cause.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni reg pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni reg pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: That which has contact is one who has contact.

original: reg pa dang ldan pa med pa ni reg pa dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa dang ldan pa med pa ni reg pa dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: Not having contact is not having contact.

original: don la zhes bya ba ni don la ma reg pa'i chos ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don la zhes bya ba ni don la ma reg pa'i chos ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: With regard to the object means that it is not a phenomenon that does not contact the object.

original: 'di gang las she na /
analyzed: 'di gang las she na /
translated: What is the reason for this?

original: sgra'i snang ba de don dag tu nges par sbyor ba ni nges par 'brel par byed cing der gnas pa thob pa ste de'i rang bzhin du snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra'i snang ba de don dag tu nges par sbyor ba ni nges par 'brel par byed cing der gnas pa thob pa ste de'i rang bzhin du snang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The appearance of sound is definitely applied to objects, which means that it is connected to them and obtains its existence in them. The meaning is that it appears as their nature.

original: 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: gang gi phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i sgra'i rnam pa phyi rol gyi don yin par rtogs shing phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa de'i phyi rol gyis byas par khas blang bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dbang po'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba'i sgra'i rnam pa phyi rol gyi don yin par rtogs shing phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa de'i phyi rol gyis byas par khas blang bar bya ba yin la /
translated: Because the aspect of sound that appears to the sense consciousness is understood to be an external object and is conceived to be external, it must be accepted as being produced by the external.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par nang du yongs su gsal ba phyi rol nyid du lhag par zhen pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyis ma byas par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par nang du yongs su gsal ba phyi rol nyid du lhag par zhen pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyis ma byas par rigs pa yin no //
translated: But the aspect of the apprehender that is clearly manifest internally is not conceived to be external, and it is reasonable that it is not produced by the external.

original: shes pa'i chos gang zhig phyi rol gyi don nyid du zhen par byas pa de ni phyi rol gyis byas pa yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i chos gang zhig phyi rol gyi don nyid du zhen par byas pa de ni phyi rol gyis byas pa yin te /
translated: Any object of consciousness that is conceived to be an external object is external.

original: dper na sngon po'i snang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sngon po'i snang ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the appearance of blue.

original: sgra'i snang ba yang don nyid du zhen par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i snang ba yang don nyid du zhen par byas pa yin no //
translated: The appearance of sound is also conceived to be an object.

original: de ga las zhes dogs na /
analyzed: de ga las zhes dogs na /
translated: If you doubt this,

original: phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa'i rnam pa de las gzugs la sogs pa'i don rnams mi rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol nyid du zhen par byas pa'i rnam pa de las gzugs la sogs pa'i don rnams mi rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it follows that forms and so on are not cognized from that aspect that is conceived to be external.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur ba yin te /🔽phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du lhag par zhen par byas pa dbang po'i shes pa'i snang ba las ni /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur ba yin te / phyi rol gyi rang bzhin du lhag par zhen par byas pa dbang po'i shes pa'i snang ba las ni /
translated: This is what is being said.🔽The appearance in a sense faculty consciousness that is conceived to be external is external.

original: gzhan phyi rol gyi don rtogs par byed pa de'i phyi rol gyis byas pa yin par blta'o //
analyzed: gzhan phyi rol gyi don rtogs par byed pa de'i phyi rol gyis byas pa yin par blta'o //

original: de las kyang de phyi rol gyis byas par khas blang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang de phyi rol gyis byas par khas blang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, it should be accepted that it is produced by external objects,

original: sgra'i snang ba de dang sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i snang ba de dang sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference between the appearance of sound and the appearance of blue, etc.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi smra ba rnams kyi phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas pa'i rnam par phyi rol rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i khyab par byed pa ni phyi rol gyis byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi smra ba rnams kyi phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas pa'i rnam par phyi rol rnam par 'jog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i khyab par byed pa ni phyi rol gyis byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the pervader of the externalists, which is the cause of positing external objects as external objects, is produced by external objects.

original: gzhan du na snang ba gang las kyang don rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na snang ba gang las kyang don rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would not understand objects from any appearance.

original: rab rib can la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa ni phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas pa yin yang slu ba'i phyir phyi rol rtogs par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: rab rib can la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pa ni phyi rol du lhag par zhen par byas pa yin yang slu ba'i phyir phyi rol rtogs par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: Although the aspects of the consciousness of those with eye disease, etc. are conceived as external objects, they do not understand external objects because they are deceptive.

original: de'i phyi rol gyis ma byas pas 'khrul pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyis ma byas pas 'khrul pa med do //
translated: Since they are not produced by external objects, they are not nondeceptive.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir don sgra'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin sgra'i rten kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir don sgra'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin sgra'i rten kyang ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, because the object is not the nature of sound, nor is it the basis of sound,

original: sgra'i rnam pa 'di yang phyi rol gyi sgra la mi ltos pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di nye ba ste /
analyzed: sgra'i rnam pa 'di yang phyi rol gyi sgra la mi ltos pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir 'di nye ba ste /
translated: and because this aspect of sound does not depend on external sound, therefore it is near,

original: thag nye ba nyid du gyur pas shes pa skyed pa na'o //
analyzed: thag nye ba nyid du gyur pas shes pa skyed pa na'o //
translated: that is, it is close, when it generates consciousness.

original: 'dis ni shes pa don nye ba la ltos pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni shes pa don nye ba la ltos pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This shows that when consciousness depends on a nearby object, it conforms to the presence or absence of the object.

original: bdag nyid du ma gyur ba ni bdag nyid ma yin pa ste gzhan no //
analyzed: bdag nyid du ma gyur ba ni bdag nyid ma yin pa ste gzhan no //
translated: Not being itself is not itself, that is, it is other.

original: de med na mi 'byung ba ni bar tshad med pa'o //🔽med na mi 'byung ba de la yod pa ni med na mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de med na mi 'byung ba ni bar tshad med pa'o // med na mi 'byung ba de la yod pa ni med na mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: Without interval means without obstruction.

original: bar chad med pa can no //
analyzed: bar chad med pa can no //
translated: That which exists in that which is without interval is without interval, that is, without obstruction.

original: gang zhig gang la mi 'khrul pa de ni de la chod pa med par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la mi 'khrul pa de ni de la chod pa med par brjod pa yin no //
translated: That which is not mistaken with regard to something is said to be without obstruction with regard to it.

original: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba ni gzhan gyi 'bras bu la bya'o //🔽gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang @45a * //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba ni gzhan gyi 'bras bu la bya'o // gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang @45a * //
translated: If the effect of another does not exist, it does not occur.

original: ba de mdun du byed pa ste /
analyzed: ba de mdun du byed pa ste /
translated: The appearance of the effect of another is not placed in front of it.

original: gzhag par 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhag par 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not tenable to posit it.

original: gzhan gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i snang ba ni gzhan las skye bar rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i snang ba ni gzhan las skye bar rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable that the appearance of the effect of another arises from another.

original: byed na ni 'jog par byed pa med pa'i phyir snang ba ma lus pa rgyu med pa can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: byed na ni 'jog par byed pa med pa'i phyir snang ba ma lus pa rgyu med pa can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
translated: If it were, then it would follow that all appearances would be without a cause, because there would be no positing of a cause.

original: ro la sogs pa phan tshun bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phan tshun gyi snang ba mi byed pa de bzhin no //🔽don gang zhig shes pa'i snang ba gang gi rgyu yin pa de ni /
analyzed: ro la sogs pa phan tshun bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phan tshun gyi snang ba mi byed pa de bzhin no // don gang zhig shes pa'i snang ba gang gi rgyu yin pa de ni /
translated: Like taste, etc., in relation to each other.

original: de la don gzhan gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i snang ba mi 'jog ste /
analyzed: de la don gzhan gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i snang ba mi 'jog ste /
translated: That object which is the cause of the appearance of a cognition is not posited as the appearance of the effect of another.

original: dper na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i ro gzugs la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i snang ba mi 'jog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lce'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i ro gzugs la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i snang ba mi 'jog pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the form of taste, etc., which is the cause of the appearance of the tongue consciousness, is not posited as the appearance of the result.

original: de bzhin du gzung ba'i don thams cad kyang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa des na sgra'i 'bras bu sgra'i rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzung ba'i don thams cad kyang dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i snang ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa des na sgra'i 'bras bu sgra'i rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, all apprehended objects are the cause of the appearance of the sense consciousnesses, and therefore the result of sound is not posited as the appearance of sound.

original: gang gi phyir skyed par byed pa nyid la ni tha dad par byed pas khyab ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir skyed par byed pa nyid la ni tha dad par byed pas khyab ste /
translated: Because that which is a producer is necessarily a differentiator.

original: rgyu tha dad kyang tha dad pa med pa yin na ni sna tshogs kyi rgyu med pa can du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad kyang tha dad pa med pa yin na ni sna tshogs kyi rgyu med pa can du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If there were a difference in cause but no difference, it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no cause for the variety.

original: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu yin na tha dad par byed pa yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu yin na tha dad par byed pa yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, if it is the cause of the appearance of the external, it must be a differentiator.

original: gzhan du na snang ba phyi rol gyi rgyu can du mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan du na snang ba phyi rol gyi rgyu can du mi 'gyur la /
translated: Otherwise, the appearance would not have an external cause,

original: phyi rol yang de'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol yang de'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the external would not be its cause.

original: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu nyid la tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin la /
analyzed: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu nyid la tha dad par byed pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the cause of the appearance of external objects is necessarily different from it.

original: don gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang ba 'jog par byed na ni tha dad par byed pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur ba des na 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pas don gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang ba 'jog par byed pa 'gog pa'i phyir don la ltos pa'i tshad ma'o
analyzed: don gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang ba 'jog par byed na ni tha dad par byed pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur ba des na 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pas don gzhan gyi 'bras bu'i snang ba 'jog par byed pa 'gog pa'i phyir don la ltos pa'i tshad ma'o
translated: If it were to posit the appearance of an effect that is a different object, it would not be different from it. Therefore, since the pervasion by contradiction is observed, it is a valid cognition that depends on the object in order to refute the positing of the appearance of an effect that is a different object.

original: // shes pa la ltos nas kyang bstan pa'i don du de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: // shes pa la ltos nas kyang bstan pa'i don du de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Also in dependence on consciousness, in order to teach the meaning, he says “that” and so on.

original: de zhes bya ba ni don nye ba de'i stobs kyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni don nye ba de'i stobs kyis 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don to //
translated: “ That” means the object that is near. “ Arising by its power” is the meaning of the reason.

original: don gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bar te rjes su 'gro bar rigs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: don gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bar te rjes su 'gro bar rigs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: “ It is not reasonable that it follow after a different object” teaches the conclusion.

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni chos can no //
translated: “ Consciousness” is the subject.

original: ro la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: ro la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni khyab pa'i yul lo //
translated: like the cognition of taste, etc.

original: rnam par shes pa gang zhig snang ba'i rgyu'i don las skyes pa de ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i rjes su bye pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang zhig snang ba'i rgyu'i don las skyes pa de ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i rjes su bye pa ma yin te /
translated: The cognition that arises from the object that is the cause of the appearance does not have the aspect of what does not produce it.

original: dper @45b na snang ba'i rgyu ro las skyes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su mi bye pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper @45b na snang ba'i rgyu ro las skyes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su mi bye pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the gustatory cognition that arises from taste, the cause of the appearance, does not have the aspect of form, etc., which does not produce it.

original: de bzhin du dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs kyang sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba'i rgyu dag gis bskyed pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs kyang sngon po la sogs pa'i snang ba'i rgyu dag gis bskyed pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, the group of the sense cognitions is produced by the causes of the appearance of blue, etc.

original: des na skyed par byed pa ma yin pa sgra'i rnam pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su bye pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na skyed par byed pa ma yin pa sgra'i rnam pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su bye pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not have the aspect of sound, which does not produce it.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rnam par so sor snang ba ni 'jog par bye pas phyi rol tha dad pa'i rjes su bye pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rnam par so sor snang ba ni 'jog par bye pas phyi rol tha dad pa'i rjes su bye pa nyid kyis /
translated: The appearance of the different external objects is due to the imprints of the various actions of sentient beings, as was explained earlier.

original: des bskyed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des bskyed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is produced by that, not by anything else.

original: don 'dis ni snang ba'i rgyu ni pa nyid kyis shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: don 'dis ni snang ba'i rgyu ni pa nyid kyis shes pa'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
translated: By this meaning, the cause of appearance is the cause of consciousness by the mere fact of being a cause of appearance.

original: snang ba'i rgyu las gzhan du ni phyi rol shes pa'i rgyur brtag par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba'i rgyu las gzhan du ni phyi rol shes pa'i rgyur brtag par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Apart from the cause of appearance, it is not possible to conceive of an external cause of consciousness.

original: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu las skyes pa'i shes pa las snang ba phyi rol gyis bskyed par bya ba nyid kyis khyab ste /
analyzed: des na phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu las skyes pa'i shes pa las snang ba phyi rol gyis bskyed par bya ba nyid kyis khyab ste /
translated: Therefore, consciousness that arises from a cause of external appearance is necessarily produced by external appearance.

original: gal te de la rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi phyi rol gyis ma byas na ni khyad par med pa'i phyir gzhan yang phyi rol gyis ma byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de la rnam pa 'ga' zhig gi phyi rol gyis ma byas na ni khyad par med pa'i phyir gzhan yang phyi rol gyis ma byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not produced by external objects in some way, then because there would be no difference, other things also would not be produced by external objects.

original: des na snang ba ma lus pa phyi rol gyis bskyed par bya ba nyid la nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na snang ba ma lus pa phyi rol gyis bskyed par bya ba nyid la nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the entire appearance would be undermined as being produced by external objects.

original: ji ste don gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba'i rnam par 'jog pa de ltar na 'jog par byad pa tha dad pa ni snang ba tha dad pa byed pa po ma yin pa des na phyi rol bskyed par bya ba nyid btang ba yin la /
analyzed: ji ste don gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba'i rnam par 'jog pa de ltar na 'jog par byad pa tha dad pa ni snang ba tha dad pa byed pa po ma yin pa des na phyi rol bskyed par bya ba nyid btang ba yin la /
translated: If it is posited as produced by another object, then the positing of the different appearance is not the producer of the different appearance. Therefore, the external object is abandoned as what is produced.

original: de lta na yang shes pa la snang ba'i rgyu las skyes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta na yang shes pa la snang ba'i rgyu las skyes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Even so, it is not produced from a cause that appears to consciousness.

original: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas gtan tshigs skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa las ldog pa na /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas gtan tshigs skyed par byed pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'dzin pa las ldog pa na /
translated: Therefore, the reason is the nonobservation of the pervader. When there is the exclusion of the apprehension of what is not a producer,

original: skyed par byed pa tsam snang bas khyab la /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa tsam snang bas khyab la /
translated: it is pervaded by mere production.

original: skye par byed pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa yang de dang 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: skye par byed pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pa yang de dang 'gal ba yin te /
translated: And the conformity to the aspect that is not a producer is contradictory to that.

original: de sna shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de sna shes pa la ltos nas kyang 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa nyid do //
translated: Since that is contradictory to the observation of the pervasion in dependence on the nose consciousness, it is observed.

original: phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu skyed par byed pa nyid dang / dbang po'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid du yang phyi rol gyi don du smra ba rnams la grun pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gnyi ga yang ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol snang ba'i rgyu skyed par byed pa nyid dang / dbang po'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid du yang phyi rol gyi don du smra ba rnams la grun pa'i phyir gtan tshigs gnyi ga yang ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Because the external object is not established as the cause of the appearance of the external object and as the cause of the production of the sense consciousness, both reasons are not established for the proponents of external objects.
